games.description: Enter the wonderful world of Capybara. In Capybara Go, begin a strategic adventure. You'll be forming and commanding your own little Capybara army. Defeat your opponents and conquer everything through strategy and combat. Lay out your Capybara's to take advantage of each one's strengths and use strategy to defeat powerful enemies.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Italian Brainrot Obby Parkour is a wild and hilarious 2 player platforming experience that blends meme-fueled chaos with classic obby parkour mechanics. Inspired by games like Tower of Hell, this title brings the unpredictable humor of the Italian brainrot meme universe into a 3D climbing challenge. Available characters are: -Tung Tung Sahur -Brr Brr Patapim -Burbaloni Luliloli -Frigo Camelo -Girafa Celestre -Lirili Larila -Orangutini Annaucini -Tralalero Tralala -Vaca Saturno Saturnita
games.instructions: In Single Player Game mode: Move: W,A,S,D or ARROW KEYS Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Camera rotate: MOUSE Zoom in/out: MOUSE SCROLL In 2 Player Game mode: Player 1: Move: W,A,S,D Jump: SPACE Sprint: L-SHIFT Player 2: Move: ARROW KEYS Jump: L Sprint: K

games.description: Obby Survivor Parkour is a fast-paced 3D parkour and escape game designed for players who trust their reflexes. You will test both your speed and balance skills while trying to survive in the obstacle filled course! Each section is full of new traps and platforms that will challenge you even more. Try to survive tsunami waves, obstacle courses, lava attacks, snowball storms and red light green light game and reach the finish line. Can you be one of the few who can reach the end of the course?
games.instructions: PLAYER 1: Movement: "W,A,S,D" Jump: "SPACE" Double Jump: "SPACE + SPACE" Freeze: "Q" Bomb: "E" Acceleration: "F" PLAYER 2: Movement: "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "J" Double Jump: "J + J" Freeze: "H" Bomb: "K" Acceleration: "L" Touch controls will be automatically activated on mobile devices such as tablets and phones.

games.description: Play Butterfly Kyodai Rainbow – a relaxing and colorful butterfly-matching puzzle game with fresh mechanics and vibrant rainbow visuals! Enjoy hundreds of exciting levels, earn daily rewards, take part in special events, and unlock beautiful new wings. A fun Mahjong-style connect game for all ages – no download required!
games.instructions: Tap or click two matching butterfly wings to connect them and set them free. Make sure the path between them is clear — other tiles will block the way. Your goal is to clear the entire board as quickly as possible. Stuck? Use boosters to help you out!

games.description: Color Cargo Puzzle Rush is the ultimate blend of color puzzle games, and sorting games! Dive into this stress-relieving world of ASMR games where you match delivery boxes with the right cargo buses by their colors. Perfect for fans of color sort puzzle and fun games, this game is all about strategy, speed, and precision.
games.instructions: Use mouse left button to play

games.description: Help Ellie recreate magical patterns using grass, fire, clouds, and more elements as you uncover the hidden order of each level.
games.instructions: Click on a tile to place down the selected element. Click on an element icon to change the element. Click on a shape icon to change the shape. In Stretch Mode, you can stretch shapes by dragging the arrows.

games.description: Soccer Tournament is a fun and fast-paced tabletop-style soccer game where you control a team of caps, flicking them to pass, shoot, and score goals. Strategize your moves, outplay your opponent, and aim for victory in this exciting, skill-based challenge!
games.instructions: Tap or click the cap (player) and drag to adjust the direction and shooting power. Release to shoot. Kick the ball into the opponent's goal to score points.

games.description: Welcome to Royal Garden Match! You’ve inherited a grand Royal Castle and a once-beautiful garden—now it’s up to you to bring its beauty to life! Solve exciting match-3 puzzles by combining exquisite royal flowers, fruits, and plants to unlock powerful boosters. With hundreds of challenging levels, unique royal characters, and a magical journey ahead, there's always something new to discover. Can you make the royal garden flourish? Play now and start your enchanting adventure!
games.instructions: Match three or more identical icons in this exciting tile-matching game! Swap flowers, fruits, and plants by dragging them to switch places—each move must form a valid match. Keep an eye on the panel to see which items to collect and how many moves you have. Match 4 or 5 pieces to unleash powerful line bursts, cross bursts, and color boosters. Merge boosters for even bigger effects! Strategize your moves, create stunning combos, and complete levels with dazzling garden magic!

games.description: Get ready for a wacky and challenging voice-controlled adventure in Chicken Scream Race! This unique game brings a hilarious twist to platform racing by letting you control your character with both taps and your voice. Whether you’re clucking quietly or screaming loudly, your chicken responds to the intensity of your sound, making each race a chaotic yet exciting experience.
games.instructions: Tap Mode: 1P Mode: Player 1: W or UP ARROW or SPACE 2P Mode: Player 1: W or SPACE Player 2: UP ARROW Voice Mode: 1P Mode: Make some noise to move the chickens. 2P Mode: Players should make noise in turn in order to move the chickens one by one.

games.description: Geometry Vibes Monster is a reaction-based arcade game where you must dodge incoming obstacles, spikes, and battle against a variety of unique monsters. Each monster features distinct attack patterns that you must skillfully avoid. Your main goal is to navigate your spaceship as far as possible while surviving the onslaught of attacks.
games.instructions: Keep your spaceship on course and avoid hitting obstacles. Stay alert for the specific attack patterns of each monster. Click and hold the "MOUSE" or press and hold the "SPACEBAR" to ascend. Release the button to dive downward. In 2,3,4 Player race mode, "UP ARROW", "SPACEBAR" "H" and "L" are used to control.

games.description: Football Rush 3d is a fast-paced, one-touch soccer game that puts you in the boots of a solo football hero. Forget complex controls—just tap, strike, and score! Whether you’re curving shots from midfield or charging down the pitch with speed boosts, every moment is packed with action.
games.instructions: WASD or arrow buttons to move. Hold Left Mouse Button (LMB) to shoot. Press Right Mouse Button(RMB) to pass. Press LMB to tackle. Press C to change camera angle. Press I to disable UI.

games.description: Get ready to navigate through the fast-paced world of healthcare, where every second counts. Your mission as a hyper nurse is to provide exceptional care to patients, manage critical situations, and ensure the smooth operation of the hospital. Get ready to put your multitasking skills to the test as you juggle multiple tasks and make crucial decisions in hyper nurse: hospital games.
games.instructions: Use left mouse button to make choices.

games.description: Deep in the Lab is 2D '90 style survival horror game, with old style pre-rendered backgrounds, puzzles to solve, keys to collect, monster to avoid or defeat (your choice), poor resources, jumpscares, limited saves, FMV and a five floors lab to explore.
games.instructions: AD Move left and right P : Open/Close Menu M : Open Map ESC: Options Menu / Skip Video E: Interact / Use / Open Door CTRL: Draw / Undraw Weapon Left Click: Attack/Shoot Right Click: Roll

games.description: Purrfect Puzzle is an adorable cat-themed tile-merging puzzle game where players strategically place and combine cat tiles with different values to achieve higher scores. With relaxing pastel visuals, the game challenges players to think ahead while enjoying a cozy, heartwarming experience. Perfect for puzzle lovers and cat enthusiasts alike!
games.instructions: Put the cat-themed tiles on the board. Three of the same tiles will create a tile of higher value. You can also use the Heart and remove some tiles if you get stuck!

games.description: Dive into city driving with four game modes. Navigate realistic traffic and monitor your fuel while exploring busy streets. Enjoy stunning morning city graphics, transforming the city into a spectacle. Pedestrians add unpredictability, and hitting them triggers police chases. Customize your car's appearance and performance. All this chaos is accompanied by your cute dog. Whether evading the cops or just cruising, Aventador Vice Crime City offers a thrilling and visually amazing experience.
games.instructions: W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys: Drive/Steer/Brake Left Shift: Nitro C: Change Camera G: Slow Motion

games.description: Kingdom match is a competitive match-3 game with castle decoration options! Complete levels, compete with other players and build the best castle!
games.instructions: Collect objects of the same color in a row and complete tasks in the levels! Complete as many levels as possible to get ahead of other players!

games.description: Match Masters is a real-time multiplayer match-3 puzzle game where players compete head-to-head on the same board. Each move requires strategic thinking, as it can benefit both you and your opponent. Utilize unique boosters, participate in tournaments, and climb the global leaderboards in this dynamic and engaging game.
games.instructions: Match 3 or more tiles of the same color to score points. Matching blue stars charges your booster; red circles charge your opponent's. Activate your booster strategically to gain an advantage. Each player takes turns, making every move crucial.

games.description: Block Crasher is a fun and fast-paced mix of classic Bubble Shooters, block-breaking games, and a bit of penalty shooting flair. Your goal is to launch colorful bubbles at moving blocks, match the colors, and score as many points as possible. It’s all about timing, precision, and quick thinking as the blocks keep shifting across the screen.
games.instructions: Aim and release to shoot bubbles at the moving blocks. Match colors to score and clear combos.

games.description: Catch The Goose is a puzzle elimination mini-game. Players can tap identical items to automatically send them to the bottom slot - when three matching items gather, they get eliminated. When players successfully clear all items arranged in the grid, they get to "catch" a mischievous goose. Its addictive simplicity, stress-relieving design, and playful art style have made it a cultural phenomenon.
games.instructions: 1. Tap three identical items to eliminate them. 2. Complete all eliminations to capture the goose. 3. Use power-ups (e.g., Add Slot or Shuffle) for tricky levels.

games.description: Flight Sim is a game where you have to guide aircraft to their landing zones, keep the skies safe to complete the levels to get high score.
games.instructions: How To Play: Guide planes and helicopters in to runway by drawing the paths Don’t crash and complete the level to get high score

games.description: Enjoy a fun pet-themed tile-matching challenge in Pet Tile Master! Draw up to 9 tiles featuring adorable pets and match three identical ones to clear them. Be careful—if the stack fills up with 9 tiles, the game is over! Use smart moves to uncover hidden tiles and complete each level. Have fun with cute animals, relaxing gameplay, and tricky puzzles!
games.instructions: Tap or click to pick a tile and place it in the stack. Match three identical tiles to clear them—if the stack reaches 9 tiles, the game is over!

games.description: Ready to create your own masterpiece from a scattering of diamonds on your screen? Come to our mosaic! Fill images with diamond scatter!
games.instructions: Instructions: 1. Choose a picture that you like 2. With a pen, apply diamonds to the canvas, matching them to the desired numbers. Get shiny, brilliant images. Controls: On PC: click with the left mouse button On mobile device: tap on the game elements on the touch screen.

games.description: Become friends with the King of Cats and build a whole kingdom together! Dive into a colorful, exciting world where you can fully demonstrate your creativity!
games.instructions: Your main task: Build a Kingdom! Tap the screen to make your residents build the city! Make improvements at every opportunity to speed up development! Make sweet waffles for workers so they mine more stones! Send builders to the mine to mine valuable ore! Process the mined stones and get jewelry from them! Pack all the loot into chests and send them for sale! Sell the loot as expensively as possible! Build new buildings and call new residents to get rich!

games.description: Put on a real destructive show! Forget about safety, in this game you need to check how strong the dummy is. At your disposal is a huge pile of dummies, an abandoned town, an incredibly huge arsenal and complete freedom of action! In this game you can check what will happen if you crash a motorcycle at full speed into a house with dynamite or what will happen if you jump out of the car a second before the accident!
games.instructions: The entire location is filled with destructible objects, try to demolish as many buildings, trees, poles and other things as possible to earn more money. Controls: PC - to speed up, you need to quickly press the left mouse button on the playing area. To exit the car or jump, press the left mouse button on the corresponding icon. Mobile - to speed up, you need to quickly press your finger on the playing area. To exit the car or jump, press your finger on the corresponding icon.

games.description: In Build a Queen 2025, you will embark on a fun journey to become a real queen. You will need to make your way through different platform levels with your opponents. Choose outfits, skin colors, and more according to your goals. Dress up in the most glamorous queen look, meet the prince, and win. You can collect money to unlock more dance steps.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Happy Blocks - Fun Puzzle Game for Everyone! ? Dive into the colorful world of Happy Blocks! Arrange and clear the blocks smartly to conquer challenging levels. Tap, move, and stack your way to the highest score! Can you solve them all?
games.instructions: Drag to move

games.description: Discover the latest makeup trends with our Graduation Makeup Trends game! From bold and fierce to soft and elegant, this game offers a variety of makeup options to suit your style. We bring 3 BFFs, each with a unique style, many makeup options, stunning dresses, and accessories for your inspiration. Mixed with floral printed dresses, golden jewelry, and holographic accessories, in the Graduation Makeup Trends game, you will find everything you need to help these girls make a statement.
games.instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

games.description: Want to have an intense table tennis battle? In Ping Pong Battle - Table Tennis, you will become a ping pong pro and compete with your opponents in a fierce competition! This game combines realistic paddle manipulation with exciting match simulation.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Welcome to the interesting parkour world of Shoot Run: Monster Hunting! In this challenging game,you will be a brave shooter. Run, collect, fight and shoot all kinds of scary monsters, show your courage and skill! Enjoy running in a variety of scenarios, challenging speed and agility.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Fly Fly Fly is a Flappy Bird alike game, where you have to fly through 30 different levels, avoiding obstacles an collecting berries. If you hit the ground it will be game over, if you crash on one of the earth worms around the level, you will lose a life. If you lost all your lives, it's game over. You can restore your health collecting the berries you will find around the level. Do your best and beat all the 30 levels and show the world what you really are!
games.instructions: Tap or Click to fly

games.description: Rotate Rings - Circle Puzzle: Twist Your Mind! Welcome to Rotate Rings, the ultimate circle puzzle challenge! Your mission is simple: rotate the rings to align the colors or images correctly. As you progress, the puzzles get trickier, testing your strategy and problem-solving skills.
games.instructions: Drag to rotation

games.description: Geometry Wave Hero is an exciting rhythm-based game that takes players on a thrilling journey through a vibrant color world. This game offers a unique twist on the classic Geometry Dash formula, focusing exclusively on the wave game mode. Players must navigate their wave through a series of challenging obstacles, using simple one-touch mechanics to control its movement.
games.instructions: The game features ten increasingly difficult levels, each accompanied by its own unique rhythm music that adds to the immersive experience. Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Rythm platform adventure; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the mouse or touch to play

games.description: "Meme Challenge.io" is straight-up chaos. It’s you vs. the wildest, most unhinged character names ever like Spaghetti Tualetti and Bombardino Crocodilo. Tap fast, think faster, and don’t get caught slippin’. It’s giving brain-lag. Only real ones can vibe their way to the Wcup.
games.instructions: Choose the correct answer / Use provided controls

games.description: Enter the most nervous stickman battles. In Stick Hero Fight, you as a mighty stickman hero. Fight through waves of enemies using incredible battle skills. This action game lets you upgrade your hero and unleash devastating attacks to dominate every fight! Use punches, weapons, and powerful skills to deliver deadly attacks.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Hey, animal lovers! Enter the enchanting world of Panda Lu's Tree House, a super fun casual simulator that will warm your heart. In this game, you play as the caretaker of the adorable panda Lu. Your adventure begins by building a magnificent tree house, a cozy and vibrant home for your furry friend.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Become the host of the popular transformation cooking show — Cooking Stories! You are not just a chef, you are a culinary genius, a style master, and an interior designer. Participants come to you at their most desperate moment: they urgently need help — and only you can change and save their lives! But that’s not all... Take a peek behind the scenes of the TV show: intrigue, emotions, unexpected twists — all this in the game Cooking Stories!
games.instructions: With each new character, you will acquire a café or restaurant and their house or apartment, which will require your management and culinary skills. Manage the character and serve guests in a timely manner! Transform the appearance of each character and their home! Choose trendy makeup. Determine the appropriate style. Organize a stylish interior.

games.description: Prepare to defend yourself. Purchase defensive structures, recharge your energy and fight off waves of monsters. Kill bosses and upgrade weapons. Complete the final day and close the portals!
games.instructions: WASD = move Left mouse button = shoot Right mouse button = iron sight Mouse wheel or 1-6 = change weapons Space = jump

games.description: World War 2 Shooter is a new first person shooter where you can become a real soldier of World War 2 and fight against enemies! Defeat foes in dynamic battles and be a hero on the battlefield!
games.instructions: Keyboard: WASD G for grenade H for use first aid kit C for squat M1 for aim M2 for shooting SPACE for jump ESC for menu SCROLL WHEEL for change weapon.

games.description: Welcome to the fabulous world filled with sparkling gems! Here you will meet two princess girlfriends who adore fashionable outfits and the glitter of colorful stones in fashionable outfits. Try on dresses inspired by the radiance of a diamond, the passion of a ruby, the freshness of an emerald and the mystery of an amethyst. Create shining combinations of hairstyles, dresses and accessories to transform young princesses into real fashion queens. Feel like a real stylist of the jewelry kingdom!
games.instructions: Help two girlfriends create a fabulous look with luxurious dresses decorated with precious stones, crystals and rhinestones. You can save the most interesting images at the end of the game as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, either a click of a computer mouse or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

games.description: Woody Tap Block is an addictive puzzle game where you have to use logical thinking to move and remove wooden blocks in the right direction. With simple yet challenging mechanics, the game offers a relaxing yet engaging experience. Plan your moves in the correct order to clear all the blocks. As you progress through levels, the puzzles become more challenging with new obstacles and block types to overcome.
games.instructions: Tap on the wooden blocks to remove them from the board — but only if they're not blocked by other pieces. Each block can move only in the direction shown by its arrow, so think carefully before tapping! The higher the level, the more difficult the challenge with different types of obstacles.

games.description: Wood Block Jam is a vibrant, addictive puzzle game where you slide colored blocks to matching doors. Swipe and slide through hundreds of creatively designed levels, featuring arrow blocks, layer blocks, freeze blocks, lock blocks, and more. Plan your moves to overcome barriers and clear each board using the fewest moves. With intuitive controls, smooth animations, and mind-bending challenges from easy to extreme, Wood Block Jam delivers endless brain-teasing fun!
games.instructions: ✅ Swipe & Slide – Move blocks in any direction. ? Match Colors – Guide each block to its matching exit. ? Avoid Obstacles – Navigate barriers and tricky layouts. ? Plan Your Moves – Think ahead to clear the board efficiently.

games.description: Discover a casual, easy-to-play game for hours of endless fun. Face off against your opponent, bounce the ball as its speed increases, and aim for the highest score. Earn coins with each hit to upgrade your racket!
games.instructions: This classic table tennis game lets players bounce the ball to score points and earn coins for racket upgrades. As the game progresses, the ball's speed increases. Choose from 21 rackets and explore 5 unique environments, each offering its own challenges and excitement.

games.description: Guess the hidden five-letter word in just six tries! Use logic, spelling, and word skills in this brain teaser. Can you crack the Pentaword?
games.instructions: Your goal is to guess the hidden 5-letter word in 6 tries or less. After each guess, the tiles will change color to show how close your guess was: Green – Correct letter in the correct spot Yellow – Correct letter in the wrong spot Gray – Letter not in the word Use your keyboard to type letters or click on the on-screen keyboard. Press Enter to submit a guess and Backspace to delete a letter.

games.description: Br Br Patapim: Obby Challenge is a wild meme-fueled obby game where you’ll jump, fall, and laugh your way through chaos! Inspired by the viral spirit of Italian Brainrot Animals of TikTok trends, this game turns parkour madness into pure comedy. Take control of the legendary Brr Brr Patapim and conquer ridiculous levels full of traps, platforms, and meme-powered surprises.
games.instructions: Controls: W, A, S, D – Move Spacebar – Jump Shift - Run Mouse – Look Around

games.description: In this captivating world of landlord games, you'll start with a modest property portfolio and a dream to become the ultimate real estate and house tycoon. Your goal is to buy, sell, and manage properties to maximize your profits and become a successful business and house tycoon in this rent game. Whether it's residential apartments, commercial complexes, or luxurious villas, it's your chance to be rich in this rent game.
games.instructions: Immerse yourself in the world of real estate Build & manage your property empire, from residential apartments to luxurious villas Collect massive rents in this rent game

games.description: Ready to begin a stylish running adventure in High Heels Collect Run! In this casual game, you’ll run through various fun environments. Stepping on heels can make you feel like a queen! Everyone loves to look perfect, and these heels will make you shine like a star!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Introducing a new exciting third-person shooter — Brawl Bros Squad! Fight opponents in a variety of conditions. Discover a variety of unique skins to make yourself unique. Enjoy dynamic jumps, accurate shooting and get ready for intense battles. Become a real champion among players around the world and prove that you are the best in this crazy world!
games.instructions: W, A, S, D - walk Space - jump R - reload 1, 2 - change weapons F - weapon selection 3, 4 - grenades P - pause LMB - shoot, throw a grenade Automatic shooting on a mobile device RMB - aim on a sniper Tab - leaderboard

games.description: Geometrix is a game about guessing the right shape. Defeat the enemies copying their shapes. When you collide with the evil shapes, if you have the same geometrical figure, you will destroy the enemy, otherwise you will lost a health point. Lost more than three points and it will be game over. Face over 40 levels, with increasing difficulty, enemies with up to 6 different geometric figures. You have to be fast and skilled to beat this game. Will you make it? If you want to know it, just try it!
games.instructions: Touch the buttons on screen to change shape

games.description: Celebrity Aesthetic Challenge lets you explore a range of unique celebrity-inspired styles! Compete in fun fashion challenges as you mix and match outfits, accessories, and hairstyles to recreate iconic looks. From E-girl and Soft-girl vibes to edgy streetwear and glam red carpet ensembles, showcase your creativity and win the ultimate fashion battle. Can you rise to the challenge and become the trendsetting fashion icon? Let the style showdown begin!
games.instructions: left mouse button click

games.description: The apocalypse is here! Hordes of zombies are swarming the streets. You are the last line of defense. Grab your gun, sharpen your shooting skills, and unleash unstoppable firepower to survive. Shoot fuel tanks, airdrops, and more to get more firepower to destroy tons of zombies. Get diamonds to upgrade your talents like Guardrail, ATK Boost, Crit Rate, or Coin earning!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: This is a casual elimination game. The main purpose of the game is to find three identical pigs, catch them, and collect all the pig collections!
games.instructions: This is a match-3 game. Find three identical items and they will be eliminated. The ultimate goal of the game is to find all the pigs!

games.description: Pool Merge Mania! Get ready for a wildly addictive twist on classic pool mechanics! In Pool Merge Mania, shoot balls into the arena and watch them bounce, collide, and merge into higher-level balls. But beware, you can only have 15 balls on the table. Tip: Fewer balls = more control. Merge them quick to stay in the game!
games.instructions: Shoot balls every few seconds into the game board. Balls of the same level merge into a new, higher-level ball! You can only have 15 balls on the table. keep it low to stay alive! Strategic shots and smart merges are your key to survival.

games.description: The fate of the world is in your hands. Will you rise to the challenge and become a beacon of hope in a land filled with darkness?
games.instructions: Prepare for an epic showdown against a diverse range of enemies! From ferocious beasts that lurk in the wilderness to grotesque mutants threatening humanity, each monster poses a unique challenge. Defeating these foes not only earns you coins and XP but also unlocks new abilities to enhance your combat prowess. Are you ready to embark on this thrilling adventure? Adapt your strategy and overcome every adversary to achieve victory and restore balance to the world!

games.description: As the watchful guardian of a prestigious museum, you're tasked with protecting the priceless artwork from eco-activists turned vandals. To succeed, you must scour the exhibition halls, gather clues, and apprehend the culprit in the act. Once apprehended, you'll conduct a tense interrogation to uncover the truth. Will you be able to find the incriminating paint bucket before the damage is done, or will the suspect's cunning and your own inexperience lead to a disastrous outcome?
games.instructions: WASD to move Left Click to Attack Right Click to show hints

games.description: Join the chillest capybara in a relaxing puzzle adventure! Merge number blocks, unlock high scores, and vibe your way to 2048 and beyond. Simple to play, soothing to master. Capybara Block Drop is your cozy brain break!
games.instructions: use mouse or touch to interact with in game element

games.description: Run fast, crash hard, and cheat death — in style. Race through a chaotic low-poly city as you dodge police, traffic, and total destruction. Use game-changing power-ups like Slow-Mo, Freeze, and EMP Blasts to escape the impossible. Unlock wild getaway cars ⚡ Grab power-ups mid-chase Smash through obstacles & roadblocks Stylized low-poly world with top-down tilt Endless cops. Infinite chaos. One rule: don’t stop. How long can you stay free?
games.instructions: Desktop: Move with WASD or Arrow Keys Collect power-ups and dodge obstacles to stay alive Touch Devices: Use on-screen touch controls to steer

games.description: Ultrahero Vs Monsters Royale Battle is an action fighting game where you, as a mighty Ultrahero. Battle against waves of evil monsters in a 3D world. Every battle is a new adventure. Feel the perfect fusion of tower defense and nervous arcade action in this game. As a hero, you must not only fight off monsters in epic battles but also use tower defense tactics to protect your base.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Jump, dash, and survive in Cube Speed Dash, a high-speed arcade challenge where every second counts! Master lightning-fast reflexes as you guide a nimble cube through treacherous obstacle courses filled with spikes, traps, and deadly pitfalls. One wrong move—and it’s game over!
games.instructions: A: Move Left D: Move Right Space: Jump

games.description: Relax and take a mini-game tour! Mini Games: Relax Collection 2 brings you a series of casual and fun mini-games, designed for you to relax in your spare time! There are various types of games,each easy to play and extremely fun, allowing you to immerse yourself easily in the game world.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In this game you have to locate the differences between the two pictures in the limited amount of time given to play each time! To play, use your mouse as control. Make sure that you don’t make a mistake more than three times because that will make you fail. One minute is the total time you will play through the 20 levels in this game! In each level you have seven differences. Good luck!
games.instructions: To find the differences use the mouse or touch the screen.

games.description: "Noob: Saving friends" - An adventure in an interesting and captivating world with Nubik. Together with Nubik, you will mine and sell ores, buy new pickaxes, upgrade skills, and try to uncover all the secrets! Will you be able to challenge the dragon and earn the maximum coins? Or maybe luck from the lucky block will smile upon you?
games.instructions: Your goal is to find all your friends and save them! Complete tasks to progress through the story and unlock new opportunities. Controls: For Mobile: Left joystick - Movement Right joystick - Destroy blocks Tap on the screen in an empty space - Place a block For PC: WASD/Arrow keys - Movement Left Mouse Button - Destroy blocks Right Mouse Button - Place a block Hold Shift - Work with the background layer E - Inventory F - Open shop Q - Drop item ESC - Pause

games.description: Imagine you are a fashion shoemaker who produces the best high heels ever. In High Heel Design, you are in charge of fashion shoe design. Yes, what you produce is not sneakers, sandals, or boots, but high heels only! Unleash your creativity and combine elements to realize your own stunning high heels in this shoe-designing game.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Car Care Repair DuDu Mechanic is a casual simulation game where you act as a skillful mechanic. Your clients meet diverse problems with their cars: broken windows, cracked car doors, flat tires, malfunctioning motors, lack of car parts...
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Cop Run 3D is an arcade-style parkour game that brings you on an exciting chase adventure! In this 3D game world, you'll play as a cop, running and jumping through the city streets. Avoid obstacles, and collect various rewards! The gameplay is simple yet fun. Use your agility to jump the fence, avoid spikes, and collect coins.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Enter the world of Kitkat Puzzle, a captivating and intricate pin puzzle game where your strategic thinking and creativity are put to the test. The mission is straightforward - unlock kitkat holes to make these chocolate bars fall in the correct sequence. Sounds simple, yet with unlimited levels of varying complexity, it promises an intriguing brain-teasing journey.
games.instructions: Use the mouse to remove the kitkat on the table

games.description: Italian Brainrot Quiz is a chaotic meme-guessing game where you match bizarre names to iconic brainrot characters! From Tralalero Tralala to Bombardiro Crocodilo and Tung Tung Tung Sahur – can you guess them all? Each round is a wild ride through surreal Italian meme culture. Laugh, confuse your friends, and become the ultimate Brainrot Champion. Spaghetti logic guaranteed. Ready to play?
games.instructions: use mouse and play

games.description: Drop and merge Italian Brainrot. Trallallero Trallala, Tum Tum Tum Saur, Boneca Ambalabu and more. Play funny memes. Drag and drop memes.
games.instructions: Drag and drop memes from the top of the screen. Two identical touch merge into a new one.

games.description: Chill Clicker is a clicker game where you multiply the Chill Capybara population by clicking. You can buy various upgrades to increase the output of Chill Capybaras, change the weather, and unlock new skins to make you the coolest Chill Capybara in town.
games.instructions: Click to play!

games.description: Hey there, game lovers! Get ready to embark on an exciting journey with Trading Games Playtime, the ultimate casual game that's all about relaxation and non-stop fun! This game is a magical blend of various mini-games, making it a one-stop destination for your entertainment needs. First off, it doubles as a fantastic antistress simulator.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Grow your idle market, hire managers, and earn money even offline! Idle Market Tycoon is a fun and addictive idle simulation game where you build and manage your own shopping empire. Start with a small stall, grow your business, hire smart managers, and upgrade every department to attract more customers and earn profits – even while you're offline! ? From fruit stands to electronic stores, expand your marketplace step by step and become the ultimate market tycoon.
games.instructions: Drag to move

games.description: On Metro escape you must search the room for items that will help you escape. Search for itens in the metro and use them to solve the puzzles. Look carefully at the various patterns around the metro and solve the riddles. Good luck to search for your way to escape!
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

games.description: A classic card game known for its simple and fun mechanics. If you love solitaire games, then this game is just for you! A famous card puzzle game that is popular among players all over the world. Perfectly relaxing!
games.instructions: The goal of the game is to arrange all the cards into four piles in ascending order, starting with the Ace, so that cards of the same suit are in the same pile. The game ends when all cards are dealt.

games.description: Begin an action-packed gun battle runner. Gun Rush is an electrifying arcade game that combines gun merging with platform running. Run forward, avoid obstacles, collect weapons, and blast your way to the finish line with ultimate firepower. Control the direction of your gun, shooting power, ATK speed, and Range to increase its value. Increase your damage by using high-value doors.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Enjoy the Italian Brainrot meme world in this Merge game. Immerse yourself in the Italian Brainrot world and merge identical characters to accumulate points and reach the highest score. A simple and easy mechanic, drop characters together to form higher-value ones, providing rewards with each successful merge. Solve the puzzle and merge all the pets!
games.instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Highscore meme game; Awesome HD Graphics; Use the mouse or touch to play

games.description: U Shape Puzzle is a unique and satisfying puzzle game where you tap on U-shaped blocks to slide them out — but only if the path is clear! Think before you tap, plan your moves, and remove every U block to finish the level. With simple one-touch controls and brain-teasing logic, this game is perfect for casual players who love puzzles with a twist.
games.instructions: Tap to unlock

games.description: Color Block Jam – an exciting puzzle game! Move the colored blocks, solve logic challenges, and complete levels. The game has many levels, from simple tasks to real brain teasers.
games.instructions: In this game, your goal is to move colored blocks and place them correctly to complete each level. But it’s not as easy as it sounds – you’ll face obstacles, limited space, and tricky puzzles that require focus and a strategic approach. Color Block Jam offers a wide range of levels with increasing difficulty. Every new challenge tests your skills: can you find the perfect solution using the fewest possible moves?

games.description: There’s no stain too tough, no dirt too thick that you can’t handle. So gear up, point your washer, and get ready to bring the shine back to everything around you.
games.instructions: Take control of your very own high-powered pressure washer and immerse yourself in the satisfying world of deep cleaning. With a variety of objects and surfaces to clean, from patios to vehicles, your task is to restore them to their former glory. The thrill of watching layers of dirt and grime vanish under the powerful spray of your pressure washer is incredibly satisfying. So, are you ready to take on the ultimate cleaning challenge?

games.description: Capybara Block Drop is a fast-paced, brain-teasing puzzle game where merging numbers and staying calm under pressure is the key to survival. Drop numbered blocks into columns, combine matching tiles, and clear space with big combos. But watch out, if the board fills up, it’s game over, and your capybara buddy might just lose his cool! With colorful visuals and satisfying number-merging mechanics, Capybara Block Drop delivers endless strategic fun wrapped in a charming, lighthearted package.
games.instructions: - Click (or tap) a column to drop a block. - Match blocks with the same number to merge them - Use power-ups to clear blocks and stay in the game longer. - Plan ahead, game over when the board is full!

games.description: My Pet Care Salon invites you to run your very own pet spa! Groom, pamper, and style a variety of adorable pets with fun, interactive activities. From bath time and nail trimming to trendy haircuts and accessory styling, provide the best care for your furry clients. Manage your salon, meet different pets, and earn rewards as you create a welcoming environment for pets and their owners. Transform your pet care dreams into reality and become the ultimate pet stylist!
games.instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

games.description: Play Sort Puzzle - Nuts and Bolts, a free and addictive sorting game! Train your brain by stacking nuts of the same color. Simple yet challenging, it's the perfect casual game to relax and sharpen your logic skills. Play now and start sorting!
games.instructions: 1 step: Click/Tap on a bolt to select a nut. 2 step: Click/Tap on another bolt with the same color (or empty) to collect nuts. Use the hints if you get stuck: Cancel move - undoes the last step you made. Extra bolt - opens extra space for nuts.

games.description: Help Bob reach his goal in Ragdoll Bob Puzzle, a quirky and fun 2D puzzle game that challenges your brain and creativity! Bob is a floppy ragdoll who needs your help to get to the endpoint while collecting as many stars as possible along the way. But here’s the twist—you can’t control Bob directly. Instead, you must guide his path by placing a limited number of blocks and objects in the right spots to create a safe and clever route.
games.instructions: Guide Ragdoll Bob to the endpoint by placing objects and solving clever physics puzzles!

games.description: Get ready for the ultimate stunt-driving challenge in Mega Ramp Car Stunts! Take control of powerful cars and race down sky-high mega ramps to perform mind-blowing jumps, flips, and tricks. Defy gravity as you soar through the air and land like a pro on impossible tracks. With dynamic gameplay, extreme stunts, and intense visuals, this is the stunt arena where only the boldest drivers survive!
games.instructions: WASD or Arrow Keys

games.description: Clap Clap is a short indie horror game that puts you in the shoes of a house sitter, experiencing strange occurrences in a seemingly ordinary home.
games.instructions: Press K to Perform action. Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

games.description: Strykon is a mobile FPS game with exciting missions and battles. Play different modes like Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Free-for-All, where your goal is to survive. Choose from many weapons, like pistols, rifles, shotguns, and snipers. Each gun has its own style. Enjoy great graphics, realistic sound, and easy controls. Earn rewards with the Battle Pass to keep the game interesting. Whether you complete missions or fight enemies, this shooter is full of action anytime, anywhere!

Welcome to an exciting journey into the world of Korean doramas heroes! Here you can become a stylist for two aspiring young film actors: a young actress whose heart beats to the rhythm of romantic stories, and a charismatic actor whose smile can melt even the coldest hearts. You will be able to choose from a variety of outfits, accessories and hairstyles, creating unique images that emphasize the individuality of your characters.
games.instructions: This game takes you into the world of Korean multi-part films-doramas, where you will take on the role of a stylist for a couple of aspiring actors. The most stylish images of your wards can be saved at the end of the game as PNG-images. Depending on the gaming device, either a click of a computer mouse or a simple touch on touchscreens is used to control it.

games.description: This game offers a whole new level of graphics and sound design that completely immerses you in a realistic atmosphere of battles. Shoot and use tactical thinking to overcome obstacles and achieve victory together with your team. Explore a variety of maps, each of which is full of unique opportunities and strategic points. Become a master of team play by coordinating with your teammates and using different character classes to create the perfect strategy.
games.instructions: Keyboard: WASD M2 - for aiming M1 - for shooting TAB - for counting P - for menu 1-2 numbers - for changing weapons. Mobile: Controls - buttons Automatic shooting when aiming or on the shoot button

games.description: Ready to match and collect? Solve puzzles to earn coins, unlock powerful power-ups and complete daily challenges to grab extra rewards and sweet bonuses. The more you play, the more opportunities you have to boost your score!
games.instructions: The game offers endless levels. Match objects to complete levels and move forward. Each level presents three difficulty options and four special abilities to help you tackle challenges. Daily quests and rotating events provide extra chances to earn rewards.

games.description: Step into the captivating world of Sticker Puzzle, where creativity and strategy come together in a beautifully immersive experience. Explore a vibrant sticker book filled with artistic challenges, visual storytelling, and mind-bending puzzles. Designed as a peaceful chromatic retreat, Sticker Puzzle blends the calming satisfaction of sticker art with the engaging thrill of strategic problem-solving — the perfect harmony of relaxation and mental stimulation.
games.instructions: Drag and Drop Stickers Match and place stickers onto the correct outlines in the scene. Use your creativity and keen eye to find where each sticker belongs. Solve with Strategy Some stickers may look similar or fit in multiple places — think carefully and solve each puzzle step by step. Unlock New Chapters Completing puzzles unlocks new pages filled with fresh challenges and stories. Collect and Customize Earn rewards and unlock special stickers to personalize your sticker book.

games.description: Enjoy an addictive stacking adventure. In Blocks Stack Rush, you’ll control a little block character running and begin a fun pixelated journey. Collect blocks, stack them high and race against time to build the perfect picture. You need to align each block and keep putting together the complete picture.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Welcome to My Purrfect Cat Hotel, a super cute cat hotel simulation management game. Enjoy cute and vivid cartoon cat animations. This is the vacation spot for all meow stars, and your mission is to create the most cozy cat hotel. Serving a variety of adorable cats and catering to their needs. Make your hotel the most popular animal tycoon hotel.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In the game “Rope Sorting” you are waiting for exciting puzzles, where you need to sort the ropes. Pass an infinite number of levels, collect stars, use aids, be the first! Rollback actions - allows you to return to the previous step to take a different path. Adding a coil - makes it easier to pass a level by adding another empty coil.
games.instructions: The rules are simple: - Only the top rope and only one color can be taken per turn. - Select the desired spool, drop the ropes onto the empty spools. - Connect and combine ropes of the same colors. - Fill the spools. That's it!

games.description: Play Vortex.io for free! Swallow everything in your path and become the biggest vortex in this fast-paced io game. Vortex.io is a competitive .io game where you control a growing vortex that can swallow objects, vehicles, and even other players. As you absorb more items, your size increases, making you more powerful in the arena. The game features smooth controls and intense gameplay, requiring quick reflexes and smart movement to survive and dominate your rivals in real time.
games.instructions: Mouse Move / Arrow Keys / WASD – Control direction

games.description: Control two tethered spheres in this unique painting challenge. Click to anchor one sphere in place while the other swings around it on an elastic tether, leaving a dynamic paint trail. Your objective? Strategically rotate your tethered pair to completely coat all target cylinders in each level.
games.instructions: One-click controls

games.description: Light up all the torches in the room to unlock the door. Some torches are linked and will toggle together when activated. Watch out for bats! Contact with them results in a game over! Your goal is to exit the house through the front yard door.
games.instructions: Arrows: Move the character. Space: Toggle torches.

games.description: Speed through tracks in Roller Coaster Rush! Play free and online in this thrilling coaster game. Roller Coaster Rush is an exhilarating 3D game that puts you in control of a speeding roller coaster. Your goal is to accelerate through the tracks without crashing, performing crazy jumps and navigating steep drops. Hold to speed up and release to slow down just in time. Each level challenges your timing and precision as you rush through colorful and thrilling environments.
games.instructions: Hold Left Mouse Button / Space – Accelerate Release – Slow down

games.description: "Secrets of the Galaxy" is an exciting match-3 game where you embark on a space journey with pilot Inessa and her faithful robot A.S.K.A. Their ship is damaged, and they are stranded in the depths of the universe. To return home, you must solve engaging puzzles by matching elements and creating powerful combos. Along the way, you will face asteroids, laser traps, space distortions, and other unique obstacles.
games.instructions: On each level, you'll face challenges like asteroids, laser traps, and space distortions. Use special bonuses, activate portals, and clear obstacles to advance. Plan your moves carefully, as some levels have time limits, while others require completing tasks in a set number of moves.

games.description: In this story-based platformer, you'll step into the shoes of a heroic protagonist driven by an undying love for their child. Experience the perfect fusion of action and platforming as Pop's Quest takes you on a high-octane adventure. With its fast-paced gameplay levels designed, you'll be engrossed in a world that demands agility, strategy, and quick reflexes. As you progress, you'll be emotionally invested and driven to save your child from danger.
games.instructions: Use A / D or Left / Right Arrow Keys to move and W / Space / Up Arrow Key to Jump

games.description: Welcome to the most terrifying train ride of your life! Cho-Cho Scary Charles: Spider Train is a chilling open-world survival horror shooter where your only lifeline is a small yellow train armed with a machine gun and a whole lot of courage. Face off against Charles — the monstrous spider-train hybrid that haunts a remote island, preying on unsuspecting humans. No one knows where he came from, but one thing is clear — he won't stop until he's fed.
games.instructions: 1-Start Your Train Begin your journey in your yellow survival train. Use the map to navigate across the haunted island. 2. Upgrade Your Train Use them to upgrade: Speed – outrun monsters Arror – take damage 3. Fight or Flee When Charles attacks, use your mounted machine gun to shoot him. Jump off the train if needed to escape or explore.

games.description: Radiation is spreading all over the world. People are going crazy, a tough battle for life continues. After falling into the trap of bandits along with your crewmates, you’ll have to fight to the end. And your best ‘friends’ — a rusty gun and a car that’s about to stall — will come to your aid.
games.instructions: WASD = move / drive a vehicle F - Enter/Exit Left-click = shoot Right-click = iron sight Mouse wheel / 1-6 = change weapons Left-shift = run C = crouch

games.description: Do you dream of creating the perfect room? In this game you will become a real interior designer! Have fun, experiment and turn an empty space into a cozy dream corner. Choose wallpaper, flooring and furniture in different styles. Decorate the room with stylish accessories, add coziness! Choose the color scheme and arrange items as you like. Experiment with design, create unique interiors and enjoy the process! Start creating your dream room now!
games.instructions: 1. Choose what you want to change Click the tassel button to start decorating! 2. browse the options Use the arrows to choose wallpaper, flooring, furniture or decorations. 3.When you find something you like, click the checkmark to save your changes. 4. Continue decorating Repeat these steps for all elements of the room until you've created the perfect space! 5.Finalize the design Done? Press the key button. 6.Want to try a different style? Click on the round arrow button to start over!

games.description: Super Dog Hero Dash is an interesting 3D running game with endless adventure and fun! You’ll become a brave dog hero running through a colorful city in this cartoonish world. Begin exciting challenges across various platforms!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: What's the most urgent situation you can imagine? Of course, it is the last second of finding a toilet. In Maze Escape: Toilet Rush, you'll have a nervous and hilarious maze escape. Each level is a brand-new maze. You need to find the best route to the toilet quickly. Use your logic and intelligence to reach your destination successfully.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In this heartwarming and healing simulation management game "Meow Flavor Restaurant", you will become a little cat owner who loves cooking and personally create your own dream restaurant. Starting from a small cat house kitchen, gradually upgrading equipment, developing new recipes, recruiting cute cat employees, until becoming the most popular internet celebrity restaurant in the city! More than 30 cats with different personalities and skills are waiting for you to collect!
games.instructions: Each cat has a unique career setting: chef, waiter, pastry chef, and even delivery guy! Combine and utilize their strengths to make your restaurant run more efficiently. Upgrade kitchen equipment, improve service efficiency, and expand menu content by earning coins.

games.description: Coffee Craze - Sorting Game is the ultimate café puzzle experience where your barista skills are put to the test! Sort colorful coffee cups, match drinks by type, and serve them quickly to satisfy every customer. With intuitive drag-and-drop mechanics, fast-paced levels, and delightful coffee-themed visuals, it’s the perfect blend of relaxing and brain-teasing fun.
games.instructions: Tap to move

games.description: Flower Collection is a poetic casual adventure game where players explore a beautiful natural world to collect various rare and beautiful flowers. The game combines exploration, collection, and light puzzle elements to bring players a peaceful and delightful gaming experience.
games.instructions: - Players take on the role of a botanist exploring the vast natural world - Find the growing locations of rare flowers by observing environmental clues - Use the correct tools and methods when collecting flowers to avoid damaging plants - Complete the flower encyclopedia to learn the stories and knowledge behind each flower

games.description: Hey there, little farmers in the making! Welcome to "Children Happy Farm DuDu"! This is an amazing casual simulator designed just for your kids. In this fun-filled farm world, you'll be the boss of your farm. The farm is full of cute animals like fluffy sheep, clucking chickens, and friendly cows. Your job is to take good care of them. Feed the animals, clean their shelters, and make sure they are happy.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Escape From Tung Tung Sahur is a fast-paced runner-platformer where quick reflexes are your only chance of survival! You play as a lone runner escaping the bizarre and relentless anomaly known as Tung Tung Sahur. Sprint across platforms, leap over deadly gaps, and avoid sudden obstacles. With intuitive one-touch controls, the game is easy to play but challenging to master. Each level introduces new platform layouts and jump timing that push your skills to the limit.
games.instructions: On Desktop: Press Arrow Up or Spacebar to jump. On Mobile: Tap to jump.
