games.description: Purrfect Puzzle is an adorable cat-themed tile-merging puzzle game where players strategically place and combine cat tiles with different values to achieve higher scores. With relaxing pastel visuals, the game challenges players to think ahead while enjoying a cozy, heartwarming experience. Perfect for puzzle lovers and cat enthusiasts alike!
games.instructions: Follow on screen instructions.

games.description: Drop and merge the most cursed Italian Brainrot memes! From "Trallallero Trallala" to "Tum Tum Tum Saur! and "Boneca Ambalabu", they’re all here. What final Brainrot will you unlock? Dare to find out!
games.instructions: - Drag and drop Brainrot memes from the top of the screen. - When two identical memes touch, they merge into a new one!

games.description: Move the tray left and right to collect the ordered ingredients! If time runs out or you collect too many extra ingredients, you will lose hearts. If you run out of hearts, it's game over.
games.instructions: Drag left or right to move the tray.

games.description: Have you ever wanted to be a hardened security officer and be on the front lines of maintaining order? In I Am Security, an ultra-realistic role-playing simulator, you play the role of a professional security guard. You decide whether or not to allow them to enter. Some guests may try to sneak in with prohibited items and find these hidden items. Performs tasks in a variety of scenarios to identify suspicious persons.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Dive into the ocean and control a hungry octopus on its journey to become the ultimate sea predator! Hunt fish, evolve new abilities, and unlock deeper, more dangerous zones in this addictive underwater adventure.
games.instructions: Move & Hunt – Swipe to guide your octopus and eat smaller sea creatures. Grow Stronger – Gain XP to upgrade stats like speed, tentacles, and stomach capacity. Evolve – Unlock powerful new forms by meeting stat requirements. Explore – Access new zones with unique fish and challenges. Complete Quests – Earn keys and rewards to progress faster. Use Gatherers – Deploy stingrays to automatically collect resources.

games.description: Brilliant Jewels is a Match 3 game where you can either play against the time or try to pass levels with limited amount of moves. If you are feeling confident, you can also challenge the hard mode on the time attack mode. This game doesn't lack any sparkle!
games.instructions: Match three or more similar jewels to clear them from the board. Match four or more to receive special tiles. Combine two special tiles to create something even more special.

games.description: Sharpen your sorting skills, challenge your brain, and race against the clock in each level. With increasingly tricky puzzles and tons of grocery items to sort, the fun never stops!
games.instructions: Take on the role of a highly organized shelf-stocker, where your task is to categorize and arrange various groceries into tidy boxes. Each box should only contain items of the same type—be it fresh produce, packaged snacks, or beverages. Meticulous sorting is the key to success, as proper organization frees up more space. However, beware! As you progress in the game, you’ll face challenges with mixed groceries, confined space, and an expanding variety of items.

games.description: Enjoy a fun shooting puzzle game in Bubble Shooter Legend. Use your shooting skills in this casual puzzle game. Your goal is to match bubbles of the same color. Make them explode and disappear to complete each level step by step. Match three or more bubbles of the same color by aiming and firing them to explode and eliminate them!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Do you dare to bet your life on an exciting roulette wheel showdown? Buckshot Roulette is a gun simulator that combines strategy, shooting and survival. Instead of a pistol, a powerful shotgun was used. Every pull of the trigger is a choice of fate. The winner lives, the loser dies. You will begin a Turn-Based shooting roulette game. Each round will have a fixed number of bullets and blanks.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow – Relaxing Brain Teaser Connect the pipes, let the water flow, and solve hundreds of satisfying puzzles! Pipe Puzzle: Connect & Flow is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game where your mission is simple: fix the pipes and restore the flow of water. Perfect for all ages, it's the ultimate brain exercise you can play anytime, anywhere.
games.instructions: Rotate pipe pieces to connect them all Make sure the water flows from start to end Use hints when you get stuck Complete levels to unlock new challenges!

games.description: Get ready to dive into a unique shooting experience with Stickman Gun Shooter! Enjoy an experience that invites you to take control of an expert shooter as you use a spinning gun to defeat fun Stickmans. The game combines realistic ragdoll physics with exciting and simple gameplay - your goal will be to destroy the yellow Stickmans that get in your way, overcoming different levels with different challenges and obstacles, while demonstrating your sniper skills!
games.instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Shooter Physics; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the mouse or touch to play

games.description: FRAGEN offers intense gunfights and challenges! With dynamic game modes, you can test your skills in different ways and become the best shooter out there! Are you ready to join the fight? Gear up, and prove your skills!
games.instructions: Keyboard: WASD G for grenade-gun C for squat R for reload 1 - primary weapon 2 - secondary weapon M1 for aim M2 for shooting SPACE for jump ESC or TAB for menu SCROLL WHEEL for change weapon SHIFT + W - run SHIFT + W + C - slide

games.description: stickman run at full speed, control stickman jump to avoid direct collision. complete each challenging and difficult level
games.instructions: touch for jump

games.description: Italian Brainrot Tung Tung Racing is a hyper-chaotic, turbo-charged racing game where logic goes to die and only the wildest survive. In a world where speed meets absurdity, you’ll choose from a trio of outrageous racers, strap into your customized Formula car, and blast through tracks so insane they might just melt your brain. This isn’t your average kart racer—this is pure, high-octane brainrot.
games.instructions: Arrow keys to move

games.description: Step into the world of Ragdoll mania : Mini games, where fun games meet ragdoll games! This is the ultimate experience for anyone looking to combine funny games with stress relief games
games.instructions: Use left mouse button to target and punch.

games.description: Challenge yourself with this captivating solitaire inspired by the classic Spider card game! Arrange all the cards on the table into complete sequences of the same suit (from King to Ace), testing your logic, strategy, and patience. Choose your difficulty level, play with one, two, or all four suits, and prove your skills with the deck. Every move counts—can you complete all the sequences before running out of options?
games.instructions: The goal is to complete descending sequences of the same suit, from King to Ace. You can move cards or stacks in descending order, even if they are of different suits. Once a complete sequence of the same suit is formed, it will be removed from the table. If no moves are available, deal new cards by tapping the deck at the top. Choose your difficulty: - Easy: 1 suit - Medium: 2 suits - Hard: 4 suits Complete all sequences to win the game!

games.description: Brick Match is a fast, fun puzzle game! Tap to match colorful bricks, trigger combos, and beat brain-teasing levels. Use boosters like the Shuffle, Colour Bomb, Extra Moves, and Row Blaster to blast through tough spots. Can you clear the board and beat your high score?
games.instructions: Here’s the revised version without emojis: • Tap groups of 2 or more same-colored bricks to clear them. • Complete the level goals before you run out of moves! • Use boosters like Colour Bomb, Row Blaster, Shuffle, and Extra Moves to help. • Bigger matches mean bigger combos and higher scores!

games.description: Zig Snake is a fast-paced arcade game where your snake zigzags forward nonstop! It's the ultimate test of your reaction speed, focus, and timing. Dive into this retro-style snake game, challenge yourself, and try to beat your high score!
games.instructions: The snake moves forward automatically. Tap or click to make the snake instantly change direction (left or right). Avoid crashing into the walls or falling off the track. Score points by staying alive as long as possible.

games.description: One Line is a casual art drawing game where your mission is to use a single line to protect an innocent man from a series of unfortunate events. From shielding him against heavy rain to fending off aggressive bees and even angry giants, each level presents a new challenge. Get creative and use the power of One Line to ensure he stays safe, all while enjoying the simple yet satisfying drawing mechanics. The more you play, the more you'll need to think outside the box to keep him protected!
games.instructions: How to Play One Line In One Line, your mission is to protect an oblivious man from a variety of threats by drawing a single line. From falling boulders to aggressive bees and even bullets, dangers are constantly looming. The puzzles start simple, but as you progress, the challenges become more complex with new elements to consider. Your line can block, divert, or shield the man, but it’s up to your creativity to figure out the best way to keep him safe.

games.description: You can test your skills in this addictive puzzle game without time or place constraints. If you like solving problems like Match 3, Sudoku or Mahjong, then you will definitely like this game. Collect three identical tiles to clear the board. Your goal is to completely clear the board of a variety of picture tiles. The levels start out easy and relaxing, but gradually become more challenging and addictive!
games.instructions: Select three identical tiles to remove them from the board. You can only select tiles that are free and not covered from above. Only 8 tiles can fit in the bottom bar. If it fills up, you lose. Your goal is to gradually remove all the tiles from the board. Use boosters to speed up the game. Play Zen Master on different devices: computer, mobile phone, tablet. We wish you good luck!

games.description: Dive into a sweet adventure in Lollipop Stack Run which is a colorful parkour game! In this fun arcade game, keep running while collecting vibrant lollipops to stack your sweet tower. You need to be flexible and glide between various obstacles, making sure to collect as many lollipops as possible during the run.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Physics Balls is a creative and challenging math and physics puzzle game. Here has numbers and ball elements. Improve your logical thinking and hands-on skills while having fun. Your aim is to break all bricks in one shoot. Throw balls to make them roll among the bricks. You can apply physical principles to control the balls cleverly.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Weapons and Ragdolls is an action-packed game featuring stickman characters and realistic physics. Use a wide range of weapons, from explosives to swords and firearms, while upgrading your arsenal to take on tougher challenges. Face diverse enemies, utilize slow-motion dodging, and enjoy randomly generated battles with increasing difficulty. Each fight offers a chance to refine your combat skills and try different strategies. Get ready for endless action and excitement!
games.instructions: Move mouse = move melee weapon Left Click = Shoot Hold right-click = slow motion

games.description: Ever watched a plane soar across the blue sky and thought, 'Hey, I could catch that… in my car!'? Well, your oddly specific and gravity-defying dreams are about to come true in 'Plane Chase'! Fasten your seatbelts, rev the engine, and remember: it's not car theft if you're aiming for the plane! Are you ready for takeoff in the wackiest chase ever? Download 'Plane Chase' and steer your way through this high-flying, tire-screeching adventure. The skies are literally not the limit!
games.instructions: Use your mouse to steer. Avoid obstacles and get into the plane!

games.description: Want to join the most hilarious and action-packed survival shooting game ever? In Doge's Battle Royale, you take control of the legendary Doge. Battle on a battlefield full of guns, weapons, and crazy opponents. Defeat enemies and pick up their items. Strategize your moves, and shoot with precision to outlast your enemies in this intense Battle Royale challenge.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

game_info.title: Pizza Tycoon
game_info.publisher: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

games.description: Play as Boss Hei Wa, running a pizza shop! Serve food, collect payments, hire and upgrade staff, and expand sales channels. Manage and grow your business to success!
games.instructions: Use Mouse to move

games.description: 2048 Merge Circle is a fun and addictive number puzzle game with a twist! Rotate the circle, aim carefully, and shoot numbered balls to merge them. Combine matching numbers to upgrade them until you reach the ultimate goal—2048! It's a fresh take on the classic 2048 game with smooth mechanics and satisfying merges. Great for fans of casual games, brain teasers, and relaxing challenges.
games.instructions: How to Play Tap to shoot a ball into the rotating circle. Balls with the same number will merge and create a higher number (e.g., 2 + 2 = 4). Aim wisely to avoid filling the circle too much. Keep merging until you reach 2048 – or go beyond to challenge your high score! The game ends if the circle gets too full and there's no space to shoot

games.description: Dive into an exciting adventure with Robby, a brave hero who finds himself trapped in a labyrinth filled with ghosts and mysterious loot boxes. In this danger-filled world, to unlock the exit, Robby must defeat all the ghosts and destroy the crates, which may contain precious coins and useful bonuses. But Robby is not alone in his fight! He has a loyal ally—a magical mushroom that can emerge from the loot boxes to assist him in battles against the ghosts.
games.instructions: Clear the level of crates and ghosts using bombs to open the exit. Use the “freezer” to blow up a frozen ghost and the “shrinker” to jump over a ghost that can corner you. Destroyed ghosts can respawn as long as there are crates on the level. Mushrooms also help destroy ghosts. Upgrade them to increase their power! But be careful of the mummies! They immediately detonate a bomb. So run away to a safe distance! Collect coins and buy upgrades.

games.description: Capybara Suika is a fun and relaxing food merge puzzle game starring adorable capybaras! Inspired by the viral Suika Game, drop and merge food to grow bigger and score higher. With colorful visuals, cozy vibes, and a tiny game size, it’s the perfect lite game to enjoy anytime!
games.instructions: Use mouse or touch to interact with in game elements.

games.description: Get ready for a great battle at the Archery Tournament, because no one is going to just give up and let you win. With each new battle, your enemies will only become stronger. But you shouldn't stay put either. Buy new equipment. A huge selection of different bows will help you defeat your enemies, from simple wooden ones to magical golden bows with incendiary arrows! Earn money by participating in the tournament.
games.instructions: Controls: PC - the sight direction changes automatically, to pull the bowstring, hold down the left mouse button, to shoot, release the left mouse button. Mobile - the sight direction changes automatically, to pull the bowstring, hold your finger on the screen, to shoot, release your finger.

games.description: Room Sort Floor Plan is a fun creative puzzle game with elements of sorting and design. In this casual game, you’ll go through proper sorting and organization. Designing the perfect layout for every room. Rearrange the floor plan to create your unique home. Each level is a jigsaw puzzle challenge.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Enjoy a casual idle simulation management game in the Idle Landmark - Builder. Here, you'll play the role of a construction tycoon and build world-famous landmarks from scratch. Manage workers to increase speed or your income, hire more workers and build your own construction empire. Build world-famous landmarks such as the Eiffel Tower and the Pyramids, and witness the entire process of their construction.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In Draw Weapon - Fight Party, you can draw your own weapons. Feel free to write your weapon, but keep an eye on the amount of ink left. Your creativity determines your combat style. Enter the 3D battle arena and fight against other opponents in an action-packed showdown. Draw precisely, craft the ultimate weapon, and crush your opponents to become the ultimate warrior.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: In this 2D puzzle-platformer, you can spin the entire world using magical leaves. Rotating the world changes gravity and helps you reach new paths. The goal is to collect all the flowers in each level. Along the way, you'll need to push boxes, open doors, and avoid spikes and silly monsters. Jump, rotate, and solve puzzles in a colorful world full of fun challenges!
games.instructions: Controls Move [A] / [D] or ⬅️ / ➡️ — Move left and right Rotate the world [Q] or ⬅️ — Rotate left [E] or ➡️ — Rotate right Jump [W], ⬆️ or [SPACE] — Jump Restart level [R] — Restart

games.description: Find objects on colorful maps with links and Easter eggs! An interesting puzzle casual indie game in the genres of "Hidden Objects" and "Find the Differences"! Embark on an exciting journey through beautiful 2D locations, where hundreds of hidden objects and riddles await you! Explore picturesque landscapes, mysterious cities and magical worlds to find all the hidden objects. And in the "Spot the Difference" mode, test your attentiveness by comparing two almost identical pictures!
games.instructions: Control on the PC by clicking on the mouse.Click on the objects on the map, as in the lower part of the panel. Moving around the map: By holding down the right mouse button or the arrow key on the keyboard Zooming: Mouse wheel (scroll) Control on a mobile device by tapping your finger on the screen. Your task is to find all the items in the list. Use the hints to find those items that are hidden too well :)

games.description: Swing between platforms in Arcade Rope! Play free and online in this rope-swinging adventure. Arcade Rope is a fast-paced and addictive skill game where your goal is to swing from platform to platform using a rope. Perfectly time your swings to avoid falling into the abyss and see how far you can go. The gameplay is simple yet challenging, making it ideal for quick play sessions. Stay alert, react quickly, and master the art of swinging to survive longer.
games.instructions: Move: W,A,S,D Stretch the rope around the buildings to destroy.

games.description: Mahjong Connect is a classic elimination-style casual game where players need to find and connect identical mahjong tiles on the board. The game rules are simple yet challenging, suitable for players of all ages.
games.instructions: - Multiple mahjong tiles are distributed on the game interface - Players need to find two identical mahjong tiles to connect

games.description: Stickman Guys Defense is an action-packed tower defense game where you must protect your base from endless waves of enemies! Command a team of brave stickman warriors, place them strategically, and upgrade their abilities to stop the invasion. From archers to sword fighters, build the ultimate defense and survive each level! Can you defend your land and become the ultimate Stickman commander?
games.instructions: Mouse Click

games.description: Step into the stylish universe of Fashion Famous! Compete in glamorous fashion contests, pick outfits that match each round’s theme, and impress the judges to earn high scores. Travel across global fashion capitals and showcase your look on dazzling runways. Explore makeup, hairstyles, and accessories to build the perfect outfit. Will your sense of style stand out among players from all around the world?
games.instructions: WASD / Arrow Keys: Move Mouse Click: Select clothes and interact with UI

games.description: Play Agents.io online! Eliminate other agents, grow your team, and dominate the arena in this free game. Agents.io is a multiplayer action game where you control a lone agent and battle against others in an open arena. As you eliminate enemies, they join your team, allowing you to grow your squad and become stronger. The more agents you collect, the easier it is to dominate your opponents. Use smart tactics, avoid bigger squads, and climb to the top of the leaderboard!
games.instructions: Mouse Move / WASD – Move agent

games.description: Tap Block Puzzle: Smash Game is a satisfying and addictive puzzle game where you tap on two or more matching blocks to smash them! ? Clear the board, create massive combos, and reach high scores in this colorful, fun-packed block smashing experience. Perfect for casual players and puzzle lovers alike!
games.instructions: Tap 2 matching blocks to smash them in this fun, colorful puzzle game!

games.description: Imagine that the time has come when ordinary racing is no longer enough adrenaline temptation. In a world where extreme sports are at the peak of popularity, a new competition has appeared - Survival Racing: Extreme Road. Overcome obstacles, avoid traps and fight your rivals to reach the finish line first. Your goal is not only to win the race, but also to survive in the face of fierce competition.
games.instructions: Control: WASD - Car control. C - camera change. Tab - opening the MENU. The space bar is a handbrake. Control for mobile devices: Use the on-screen game interface.

games.description: Shoot the car with guns. Launch a combat drone or summon a tornado. Ram the car with a giant hammer or blow up all the windows with dynamite. There are many ways to destroy a car waiting for you in this game.
games.instructions: Left mouse button - Fire Right mouse button - Rotate Mouse wheel - Zoom Destroy the cars and get rewarded. Buy new improvements

game_info.title: Garden Guardians
game_info.publisher: Guangzhou Yomitoo Network Technology Co., Ltd.

games.description: A fun and strategic tower defense game that’s easy to pick up! Tap directional arrows to launch seeds into flowerpots—each seed blossoms into a powerful flower ready to blast incoming zombies. Plan your moves, hold the line, and protect your garden from the undead horde!
games.instructions: Tap arrow tiles to plant seeds and shoot zombies.

games.description: Dive into the exciting world of Ocean Small Hospital - Doctor! This casual and educational game is an absolute blast for animal lovers. In this game, you'll step into the role of a heroic doctor on a submarine-turned-hospital. Your mission? Rescue injured sea animals from the vast ocean depths. As you spot a distressed creature, quickly assemble your medical team and gear.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Begin a challenging yet relaxing casual game in Find It Out Colorful Book. It brings you into a colorful world. You will begin an adventure to find hidden objects. Choose your favorite mode like beach, city, zoo, etc. Each page is filled with color and mysterious numbers waiting to be discovered and unlocked.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Italian Brainrot Jigsaw is a funny puzzle game with the most popular meme characters. You can select one of the fifteen images and then select one of the four modes (16, 36, 64 and 100 pieces). Select your favorite picture and complete the jigsaw in the shortest time possible! Have fun and enjoy!
games.instructions: Use mouse or touch on the screen to solve the puzzle!

games.description: Swap products to match three of the same kind and fulfill customer requests. Products can be moved to empty shelves, and items in the back will move forward when the front ones are removed. Each move decreases the number of moves left, and the game ends when the move count reaches 0.
games.instructions: Tap a product to pick it up, then tap an empty shelf to place it.

games.description: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run is a stylish dress-up game where you join glamorous catwalk competitions. Pick the perfect outfit, match accessories, style your hair, and impress the judges. Travel to fashion shows around the world, earn points, unlock outfits, and become a global trendsetter. Win challenges to climb the leaderboard and prove your fashion sense. Every level brings a new style theme to conquer!
games.instructions: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK to apply dresses on your character between the options during the walk.

games.description: Do you want to begin a fun dinosaur-themed shooting game in Dino Hide N Shoot? Play a brave gunman on an exciting adventure! In this game, you will constantly run to avoid the attack of dinosaurs.And pick up the bullets, accumulate enough firepower. Pay attention to using the box as cover,seize the moment to shoot at the dinosaur! The gameplay is simple yet challenging.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Digger Fighter in the Maze is an action-packed adventure game that takes you deep into a mysterious underground labyrinth filled with secrets, dangers, and treasures. Step into the shoes of a brave digger fighter as you tunnel your way through winding mazes, uncover hidden paths, and gather valuable resources. Along the way, you'll meet and recruit powerful allies, each with unique abilities that can help you overcome obstacles and defeat fierce enemies.
games.instructions: Move: Swipe or use on-screen controls to navigate the maze. Dig: Tap to dig through dirt and discover hidden paths. Interact: Approach NPCs to talk, accept quests, or unlock help. Battle: Use your weapon and special abilities to fight enemies in real-time combat. Team Up: Recruit allies you meet in the maze—each with unique skills. Solve: Use levers, pressure plates, and objects to solve puzzles and unlock new areas. Prepare: Gather items and upgrade your gear to face the final boss.

games.description: Ready to become the ultimate bathroom tycoon? In this exciting mix of simulation, management, and idle tycoon gameplay, you’ll start with a small restroom. Grow it into a luxurious five-star hygiene haven! Upgrade facilities, optimize services, and expand your empire to make your bathroom the most popular spot in town. Manage your front desk with care, and faster cashiering will give you more cash flow.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Mr Disc is here to strike! Swipe, aim, and throw powerful discs to smash enemies, break obstacles, and clear every level in style. Easy to play, hard to master – can you become the ultimate Slingshot Striker?
games.instructions: Be Mr Disc! Swipe to throw discs and knock out everything in your path

games.description: Challenge your brain to break through the fog of horror. In Horror Playtime - Room Escape you will enter a mysterious story. You spend your birthday with Ye Chen on the roof of a building. The strange woman suddenly appeared and trapped you in a horrible room. Enter many rooms full of puzzles and horror! Use your brain to solve hidden things and uncover the truth of horror stories. Every detail in the room is full of mystery.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Gear up and fight your way to safety in Get To The Chopper, a thrilling 3D first-person shooter where every mission is a battle for survival! Your objective is clear: reach the extraction chopper while eliminating all enemies standing in your way. Armed with a fully customizable loadout—including a primary gun, secondary weapon, grenades, and a melee weapon—you’ll face waves of enemies across dynamic battlefields such as forests, deserts, and more.
games.instructions: Blast through enemies and fight your way to the extraction point in this intense 3D first-person shooter!

games.description: Get ready to unlock a world of tricky puzzles and brain teasers in Save the Daddy. Each level is unique and carefully designed to challenge your mind and test your IQ. Pull the pin in the right order and help the man escape from dangerous monsters & obstacles safely and thoughtfully. Play each level very cautiously by analyzing your move before pulling the pin. As you progress, levels increase in difficulty which will make you game challenging and earn more rewards.
games.instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Puzzle game; Challenge your mind; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the mouse or touch to play

games.description: Test your skill and logic with Klondike, the classic solitaire game loved by generations! Stack the cards in ascending order, alternating colors, and complete all four suits to win the game. With clean graphics, intuitive controls, and the option to play with one or three cards, Klondike offers hours of fun and relaxation. Perfect for a quick break or a long strategic challenge!
games.instructions: Stack the cards in ascending order, alternating colors, and complete all four suits

games.description: Jump into the viral madness of Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge — a hilarious meme-based platformer where you dodge traps, jump across chaos, and try to survive with style. Inspired by trending TikTok memes, especially the absurd world of Italian Brainrot Animals. Play as the one and only meme legend, Tung Tung Sahur, and conquer chaotic Obby parkour levels like never before.
games.instructions: Controls: W, A, S, D – Move Spacebar – Jump Mouse – Look Around

games.description: Grab your shovel and start your journey deep into the earth. Mine valuable resources, upgrade your tools, level up your skills, and unlock new opportunities for even faster digging. The deeper you dig, the richer the treasures. Can you reach the very bottom?
games.instructions: You'll be digging the ground, extracting valuable resources, and selling them. Use the money you earn to upgrade your stats and speed up your digging. Controls: - WASD — Move - Space — Jump - Double Space + Hold — Fly (after purchasing the jetpack) - Left Mouse Button — Dig/Collect resources - E — Interact with elements in the garage - Q — back to menu

games.description: Container Sort Puzzle - Sort All the Cargo! Get ready to test your brain with Container Sort Puzzle, the ultimate cargo-sorting challenge! Load the right containers onto the right ships and become a port master! Perfect for fans of sort games, stacking puzzles, and logic-based challenges. Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned puzzler, Container Sort Puzzle will keep your brain sharp and entertained.
games.instructions: Your mission is simple: drag, stack, and sort containers based on color and type. But don’t be fooled—every level gets trickier! Plan your moves, unlock new harbors, and organize the chaos!

games.description: Fruit Mahjong 3D is a relaxing puzzle game where you match pairs of fruit-themed tiles in 3D space. Rotate the view, find free tiles, and clear the board by matching identical pieces. Each level is handcrafted and fully solvable, offering a mix of easy and challenging layouts. The game starts with a short tutorial and gradually increases in difficulty. Use shuffle and hint buttons if you get stuck. Enjoy colorful graphics, smooth animations, and intuitive controls on both mobile and desktop.
games.instructions: Find and match two tiles with the same fruit-themed image. Tiles can only be matched if they’re not blocked by others. If you need help, use the ‘Hint’ and ‘Shuffle’ buttons.

games.description: Single Stroke: Energy Line Puzzle is a fun and simple way to train your brain every day. This mind-challenging game has easy rules—just connect all the circles using a single continuous line. It’s a great way to keep your brain sharp with quick, clever puzzles. Spend just a few minutes daily to give your mind a boost. Enjoy this brain-training experience anytime, anywhere!
games.instructions: Simply draw a line to light up all the circles using one continuous stroke. If you get stuck, use a hint or restart the level to try again.

games.description: Get ready for an electrifying challenge in Geometry Dash Jump Test your reflexes and timing as you jump, fly, and dash through neon-lit obstacles in a world of glowing geometry. With fast-paced action, rhythmic music, and intense gameplay, this game will push your skills to the limit!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Get ready to make some seriously delicious cakes in Perfect Cake Maker! It’s a delightful casual simulation game. When you start, you’ll see a fully stocked kitchen and delicious guests waiting. First, choose the cake base based on your guests’ needs. Then comes the fun part – mixing the ingredients!
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: You have many parts of the same picture. Drag and drop the parts and assemble the character picture. A game about Italian animal characters. Each level is a new character. Unlock them all!
games.instructions: Drag and drop pieces of the picture from the bottom to assemble the whole picture. Insert the pieces in the correct place.

games.description: LOL Funny Dance is a hilarious 2D game where you can distort the faces of politicians and celebrities to create the funniest expressions! Drag and move different points on the image to stretch, twist, and transform their looks into ridiculous and exaggerated versions. Watch them dance and react as you manipulate their faces in real time. Play the LOL Funny Dance game now.
games.instructions: Mouse to play.

games.description: explore lush scenes, tackle tricky obstacles, and unlock upgrades. Every level blends fun challenges with strategic boosts
games.instructions: Swipe to control the turret and shoot—break obstacles

games.description: Dive into the enchanting world of matching games - Candy Pop Mania - where delightful fun and challenging games await! Pop, blast and match 3 sweets to keep on the adventure! Use combos and reach the best results! Challenge yourself to win all of the levels of Candy Pop Mania!
games.instructions: - Swipe tiles horizontally or vertically to create a line of three or more matching items. - Matches of four or more create special tiles with unique abilities. - Use power-ups to help clear difficult parts of the board. - Complete levels to earn rewards.

games.description: Are you a pet person? Do you wanna run a farm that is full of cute animals? Try Animal Sort, not only be an owner but also be in charge of keeping them in line - the game you should not look away. This is not just a regular puzzle game, but it's also a fantastic one with a lot of mini games included. Moreover, we have an additional mode of building the pet city that you definitely won't be able to miss. Let's give it a try!
games.instructions: Use your mouse to move the pets.

games.description: Unleash your shooting skills and break bricks in Shoot N Crush. This game is the best choice for your leisure time. Your goal is to shoot with precision and flexibility. Use the bouncing ball to smash a solid brick with precision. Each level has a different objective and difficulty, you need to break these bricks in the smartest way possible.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Players play the role of cleaners in the health center in the game. They are responsible for the cleaning and sanitation work in all areas within the health center, keeping the environment of the health center clean and hygienic and providing a good environment for clients. The game features a fresh and lovely art style, with the details of characters and buildings depicted vividly, bringing players a healing visual enjoyment.
games.instructions: There is a variety of cleaning tasks: including common cleaning jobs such as sweeping the floor, mopping the floor, wiping surfaces, and disposing of garbage. Different areas have their corresponding cleaning tasks and requirements. When cleaning, players can also use a wide range of cleaning tools and equipment like brooms, mops, vacuum cleaners, rags, disinfectants and so on to complete the cleaning tasks.

games.description: Sudoku by in8finity is a classic puzzle game with a sleek dark theme, offering a smooth and enjoyable experience. Flexible settings let you adjust the difficulty to match your skill level. With intuitive controls and eye-friendly visuals, you can focus on solving puzzles without distractions. More than just a game, Sudoku trains logic, concentration, and memory. Challenge yourself and enjoy relaxing, distraction-free gameplay!
games.instructions: Sudoku is a logic-based puzzle where you must fill a 9×9 grid so that every row, every column, and each of the nine 3×3 squares contain the numbers 1 to 9 without repetition. Select an empty cell and enter a number that follows the rules. Use logic and elimination to find the correct solutions. If you make a mistake, you can change the number or use hints. Customize the difficulty to your liking, play at your own pace, and enjoy the challenge!

games.description: Welcome to the world of Italian Neuro-Animals! This is a clicker game featuring bizarre creatures generated by neural networks — get ready for chaos, memes, and pizza. Collect them all! Level up like crazy! And may the Neuro-Pizza be with you
games.instructions: Tap the screen with the character and get neuro-chips Upgrade in the upgrade menu to earn even faster and collect a full collection of animals Compete with other players and take the highest positions in the leaderboards

games.description: Combine magical potions to create bigger ones! Potion Merge Witch brings you a relaxing and magical merging experience. Can you create the ultimate potion? Try it now! - Combine identical potions to create new, bigger ones. - Use three special buttons: shake the cauldron, remove a potion or upgrade potions to speed up merging. Help the witch craft the biggest and most powerful potion ever!
games.instructions: On Desktop: Move your mouse to control the witch’s position, and click to throw potions into the cauldron On Mobile: Drag your finger to move the witch, and release to throw potions with a touch

games.description: Drift and earn in this fast-paced 2D endless drifting game! Master the art of controlled slides across an ever-changing track. Rack up cash by chaining stylish drifts and maintaining momentum—then use your earnings to unlock a growing collection of iconic drift cars, each with its own unique stats and feel. But it’s not just about the money—complete challenges to test your skill, and unlock a special car. Easy to pick up, hard to master—how far can you go before you crash?
games.instructions: WASD or arrow keys to move

games.description: You've been abducted. To prove you're intelligent, aliens test you with strange puzzles and machines. Push buttons, solve challenges, survive the test.
games.instructions: Use only your mouse or touchpad. Click buttons, levers, and switches to discover logic patterns and complete each level.

games.description: Hey, how about helping me decorate my house? You need to decorate my home beautifully, buy me nice clothes, and feed me. Let's get started — right now, I have an empty house, and we need to furnish it together. Let's make it look organized and cozy! Before I get too hungry, you must take me to the café to eat, or I might lose my life from hunger! We also need to earn money. To make money, reach the computer and use the money-making app. You can either buy things or continue earning more money!
games.instructions: *Use the "WASD" keys to move. *Playable on both mobile and PC. *4 different hairstyles and 4 different outfits are waiting for you. *2 different ways to earn money.

games.description: Develop your logic and train your brain in "Sudoku Guru - Classic Sudoku"! Enjoy Sudoku, solve daily challenges and get trophies for completing tasks. There are 5 different difficulty levels available to you: easy, medium, difficult, expert and guru. Each level is a unique puzzle. Track your progress and challenge yourself with the statistics report. This feature adds a competitive element to the game, motivating you to become a real guru.
games.instructions: The goal of Sudoku is to fill the 9x9 playing field (each row, column and 3x3 block) with numbers from 1 to 9. The basic rules of Sudoku are: - vertical numbers should not be repeated; - numbers should not be duplicated horizontally; - a number can appear in a 3x3 square only once.

games.description: Tap connected blocks to clear them! If any blocks are left, you will lose life. The game ends when your life reaches 0. You can use placed special bombs by tapping them.
games.instructions: Tap two or more connected blocks to clear them.

games.description: The White Room 5 is the fifth sequel of an adventure escape game with a cartoon art style. Find objects that can help you escape the room and use your logic to solve the puzzles. Good luck!
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

games.description: Swordsman Adventure is a thrilling adventure game where you wield your sword freely on the battlefield to complete a series of missions. In this role-playing game, you control your soldier to attack enemies of different hit points. You get rewards at the end of each mission completed, which you can use to upgrade your attack points or to equip with a new weapon.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Toy Claw Simulator is a fun and addictive arcade game where you take control of a virtual claw machine to collect a wide variety of adorable toys! Carefully aim and time your claw to grab plushies, action figures, and surprise collectibles. Once you've stocked up your toy inventory, head over to the factory to sell them for shiny coins! Use your earnings to run the machine to use the crane to unlock new toys. It's a charming blend of skill, strategy, and rewarding progression!
games.instructions: Use WASD or Arrow keys to move the crane. Spacebar to grab a toy. Touch and move your finger to move the crane. Click to red button to grab a toy.

games.description: Test your logic and strategy in this unique puzzle game. Solve intricate challenges by unscrewing bolts in the right order—every move counts. Features: Unique Levels – Each puzzle offers a fresh challenge. Strategic Gameplay – The sequence of moves is key. Engaging Puzzles – Designed to push your problem-solving skills. Every detail matters. Can you master the mechanics?
games.instructions: Your task is to move all the bolts so that all the slats fall down. Just click on a bolt and move it to a free nut in the correct order to free a slat. Determine the correct order of moving.

games.description: Laugh and prank the teacher in this fun school game! Have you ever dreamed of playing a prank on your teacher? Now you have a chance! In this game, you will become a student who arranges funny pranks right during the lesson. Use the most unexpected "tools", upgrade them and watch the funny reactions of the teacher!
games.instructions: How to play: Choose a weapon — in your arsenal there are various items for practical jokes: paper airplanes, rotten eggs, darts and others. Each item has its own characteristics, so choose wisely! Watch the reactions — each of your practical jokes causes funny reactions from the teacher! The more you play him, the more vivid his emotions become — from irritation to real tantrums!

games.description: Hunting underwater spearfishing – a realistic diving adventure! Dive into underwater exploration as a diver in a wetsuit, hunting with scuba gear. Explore lakes, seas, and oceans, encounter 30+ marine species, and marvel at coral reefs. Freediving, underwater hunting, and treasure searches await! Upgrade harpoons, masks, and tanks, battle predators, and survive hostile depths. Discover new locations and earn rewards to improve with every dive!
games.instructions: PC Controls: - Move with WASD, ascend with R, descend with F. - Shoot with the left mouse button. Aim carefully and get close to the fish for a precise shot. Smartphone Controls: - Use on-screen joysticks to move. - Tap "Shoot" to fire your harpoon. Tips: - Aim carefully and shoot at the right moment. - Upgrade gear like harpoons, masks, and tanks with coins and pearls. - Explore, hunt rare fish, and unlock new locations!

games.description: Make choices as the Supreme Leader of a dystopian state. Maintain control, balance resources, and crush opposition—or be overthrown!
games.instructions: Use the mouse to approve or reject requests from visitors. Each choice affects population, treasury, state power, and living standards. Lose any one — and you fall.

games.description: Sharpen your mind each day with fun single-line drawing puzzles — clever, captivating brain teasers that boost your cognitive skills one stroke at a time. Enjoy a relaxing and rewarding 20-minute mental workout! Would you like a version tailored for an app store description or marketing banner?
games.instructions: Start Drawing: Tap and drag to draw a line. One Stroke Only: Complete the entire shape without lifting your finger or retracing any line. Think Ahead: Plan your path carefully — every line counts! Complete the Puzzle: Finish the shape in one smooth motion to solve it. Progress & Challenge: Each level gets trickier — test your logic and pattern skills as you go!

games.description: BlowUp ATM – The ultimate heist action game where you become a master thief! Your mission? Plant explosives, blow up ATMs, and grab as much cash as you can before escaping! But beware – the cops are always on high alert!
games.instructions: Find an ATM – Move around the city and locate your target. Detonate & collect cash – Watch the money fly and grab as much as possible! Avoid the police – Escape before security or the cops catch you! Upgrade your heist gear – Unlock better explosives and faster getaways!

games.description: At the start of each level, players must quickly locate powerful weapons like the shotgun and sniper rifle, crucial for fending off hordes of zombies. Once the eerie alarm sounds, grotesque, ferocious undead flood the area. A single mistake can lead to being swarmed, so precise marksmanship, agile movement, and calm judgment are essential for survival.
games.instructions: move：W A S D jump: SPACE fire: MOUSE 1 aim: MOUSE 2 roll: X reload: R interact: F crouch: C

games.description: Get ready to soar through the stars in Sprunki Space Challenge an intergalactic online adventure where brave kids take flight to save the galaxy. This wild space ride throws you into the cockpit of a zippy space rover where danger lurks in every asteroid and rocket burst. But worry not: Sprunki is here to lead the charge. It is all about timing, reflexes, and sky-high jumps that send you sailing straight into the action.
games.instructions: Arrow keys to move!

games.description: Unleash your creativity with the Italian Tung Coloring Book, a hilarious and surreal coloring experience inspired by the viral Italian Brainrot meme phenomenon. Featuring absurd characters like Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Tralalero Tralala, and Bombardiro Crocodilo, this coloring book offers a unique blend of humor and art. Each page presents a bizarre and whimsical scene, inviting you to add your personal touch with colors.
games.instructions: Mouse Click

games.description: In "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator" you will find crazy levels, chaos physics and familiar characters! How far can you go, creating incredible moments with a ragdoll? -Unique levels, where every object can become a tool of fun. -Realistic ragdoll physics - push, throw and watch the result! -The more you play, the more new situations you discover! Jump into "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator" and check what chaos physics is capable of! Complete all the tests, open new opportunities and enjoy crazy fun!
games.instructions: How to play "Ragdoll Beat - Simulator"? -Open the game to start your journey. -Use objects, to do this, pull them onto the ragdoll, creating unexpected situations. -Explore physics, combine objects and see how they interact with the ragdoll. -Open all the familiar characters and try out the ragdoll's capabilities on them!

games.description: Ninja Spell Match is a fast-paced blend of match-3 puzzling and ninja action. Connect tiles to charge up your attacks and unleash devastating moves against waves of enemies. With each level, the challenge grows tougher as you fight your way through 30 unique stages packed with traps, puzzles, and rival ninjas. Think fast, match smart, and strike hard—your reflexes and strategy are the only way to survive.
games.instructions: Connect 3 or more tiles to attack, defense or recover. Destroy all enemy waves to advance to the next level.

games.description: Are you ready to experience unique car-driving gameplay? Start with your SUV and unlock new vehicles as you progress through the game, playing different and unique levels. Drive your favorite vehicles, and navigate your way around new challenging environments. We welcome all racing car game fans to experience this new driving game! Real Drive 3D is a car simulation game which will give you a unique arcade experience.
games.instructions: Use W/A/S/D or on screen controls to move the car

games.description: Put your mind to the test with FreeCell, one of the most beloved solitaire card games of all time! Move cards between columns, use the free cells cleverly, and organize suits in ascending order to win. Elegant graphics, smooth animations, and intuitive controls make every game a relaxing and satisfying experience. Whether you're a solitaire veteran or a curious beginner, FreeCell will win you over with its perfect mix of simplicity and strategy.
games.instructions: The goal is to move all cards into the four final piles (one for each suit), arranging them from Ace to King. You can move cards between the eight columns, always in descending order and alternating colors (red/black). Use the 4 free cells on the left to temporarily park cards and plan more complex moves. The more empty cells and columns you have, the more cards you can move at once. Every game is solvable… if you can find the right combination of moves!

games.description: How far can your skills take you? Target, shoot and merge cubes while unlocking exciting upgrades and customizations. Enjoy captivating gameplay and stunning visuals with every move you make. The 2048 cube challenge begins now!
games.instructions: The player shoots numbered cubes on the board. Each cube displays a number, starting at 2. Merging cubes of the same value forms larger numbers, progressing to 4, 8, 16, 32, and beyond. The goal is to achieve the highest score.

games.description: Helping Little Duck In this Skill Game help a charming little duckling to fall into the tub with water. Throw the water in the correct places so that the duckling falls directly into the tub. - Play Helping Little Duck Free and Enjoy!
games.instructions: Use your mouse to push the duck

games.description: The adventures of a serious head continue. Portals open, monsters come out. Prepare for battle: rebuild your base and upgrade your weapons. Take your partners to help you and put up a decent resistance!
games.instructions: Build mode: 1- 6 keys = choose a building Left mouse button = confirm selection Right mouse button = cancel selection Mouse wheel = rotate R = delete mode Battle mode: WASD or arrow keys = move Left mouse button = shoot Right mouse button = iron sight Mouse wheel / 0-9 = change weapons Space = jump Z / X / C = ability

games.description: Build the tallest structure by stacking beautiful new floors. Each floor contains intricate pillars and arches reminiscent of the mighty Greek civilization. Challenge yourself to create the most majestic tower in ancient history.
games.instructions: Build the tallest Greek tower the world

games.description: You can play against the provided levels or create your own battle. Victory depends only on the best strategy! With the most accurate placement of your army, you will achieve the best results!
games.instructions: For level mode: Use the gold gained in each level to select your troops and place them accurately on the map. In level mode, there is a limit on the number of warriors and gold to hire. For sandbox mode: Place both your own and the enemy army. Head to the battlefield and watch the battle simulation! In sandbox mode, restrictions are minimal. For PC Use the left or right mouse button to rotate the camera. - W-A-S-D or Arrow keys to control the camera;

games.description: Zombies have taken over the world! Unlock bases and deploy soldiers with unique weapons, each with stats like damage, fire rate, and reload speed. Soldiers must reload at the base before defending. Place them wisely to stop zombies within range. Defeat waves to earn coins, upgrade bases, and survive stronger hordes. Strategically choose soldiers to clear waves and save cities across the globe.

games.description: Welcome to Candy Chain Master! The board has blue tiles with candies on them. Start by selecting a candy and move across nearby tiles with the same candy to make a chain of three or more. Each tile must turn golden by matching at least one candy on it. Think carefully and move fast to turn all tiles golden before time runs out.
games.instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

games.description: Our game will show you in all the beauty of the real sea world. A world in which life is booming, because it is inhabited by sea creatures, mermaids, shells, plankton and many other amazing creatures of the sea world!
games.instructions: Mermaid Beauty's dressing room. Pick up her hairstyle, jewelry, and even the color for her tail. Fish Doctor. Yes, yes, fish also get sick, and they also have a doctor. Who will surely help, and cure. Find the objects. Test your attention, your keen eyes. Find hidden objects at the bottom of the sea! Create a beautiful sea world. Decorate the world of underwater inhabitants to your liking. Ecology. People often pollute our sea. Put the seabed in order. Save the fish, make the seabed cleaner!

games.description: Swing with Stickboys and jump your way to the finish line. Stickboys needs your help. Assist him and reach the goal! Jump from launch ramps and shoot webs to get to the end. You must complete every level. Be careful — if you fall from the sky, you lose the game.

games.description: ? Wacky Wheels – Drift, Dodge & Dominate! Master the chaos in Wacky Wheels, the ultimate test of timing and control! Each level brings new challenges, themes, and physics that’ll keep you on the edge of your seat. ? It’s not just a race — it’s a wacky adventure of skill and speed!

Unlock new dining tables and kitchen equipment to improve efficiency. Recruiting chefs and servers to create an ultra-efficient restaurant team.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Happy Color – Smash Bricks & Relax! ? Are you ready for the most satisfying brick-smashing experience? Grab your colorful hammer and start breaking tiles in Happy Color! This fun and relaxing game will take you on a journey through vibrant levels filled with exciting challenges. Smash, break, and clear the board in a visually stunning environment designed to keep you entertained for hours!
games.instructions: The gameplay is simple yet addictive! Anyone can play, but mastering the game takes skill: Tap and Hold – Control your hammer to smash tiles. Break All the Blocks – Clear every tile to complete the level. Upgrade Your Hammer – Unlock powerful effects and new designs! Reach Higher Levels – Face more complex puzzles as you progress.

games.description: Just Ludo is a tabletop dice board game. Roll the dice and let your chess pieces reach the finish line first, so as to defeat the opponent and win rich rewards. Are you ready for the challenge?

games.description: In "Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch", you'll see the world from a unique perspective - through the eyes of the glove itself! What Awaits You: -First-person camera - Feel like you're delivering the punch yourself! -Minecraft-style characters and vibrant action-packed scenes -Epic punches and spectacular body launches on every level -Multiple glove skins - choose yours and strike with style! Test your accuracy and style in "Noob Ragdoll: Crazy Punch" - ragdoll physics has never been this dynamic!
games.instructions: How to play "Ragdoll Playground: Cube Strike": - Open a level and aim from the glove's perspective - Click on targets - watch characters go flying - Earn coins for every accurate hit - Unlock new glove skins and try them out - Become the master of cubic strikes and show who's boss!

games.description: Nonogram Master is an exciting puzzle game based on Japanese crosswords. Solve hidden pixel pictures using numbers as clues! Choose a comfortable control method: PC — Left-click to fill a square, right-click to mark with an "X". Mobile — Tap control: select a mode and tap a cell. Customize the game, train your logic, and enjoy the process! Are you ready to become a Nonogram Master?
games.instructions: How to Solve Nonograms: 1. Read the Clues Numbers next to rows and columns tell you how many squares to fill. Multiple numbers mean separate groups, with at least one empty square between them. 2. Start Simple Fill rows or columns where the numbers add up to the total length. Mark empty squares with an "X" if you're sure they're not filled. 3. Watch the Picture AppearKeep going step by step. There's only one solution, so take your time and enjoy!

games.description: Get ready for a wonderful pixel battle in Pixel Island War! This strategy game brings you to a wonderful pixel world. Here your task is to conquer islands and expand your empire. Build bases, gather resources and prepare for fierce battles on different islands. For example, choose an island to place humans on. Humans will build towns and multiply. Choose sheep to produce wool and meat.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.instructions: - Click on the mod button - Choose the mod you like - Create your own unique compositions and groups - Copy the rating while you play and find out who will be next - Open all the mods and try each one!

games.description: The White Room 4 is an immersive escape game that challenges your logic and problem-solving skills. Find yourself trapped in a hotel room and embark on a thrilling adventure to escape. Utilize the tools at your disposal, solve intricate puzzles, uncover hidden clues, and crack passwords to unlock your path to freedom. Will you be able to conquer the puzzles and break free from this challenging escape experience?
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to interact with the objects.

games.description: A number elimination game, connect two numbers that are the same or add up to 10, eliminate them!Relax and match in a peaceful bamboo forest. If you enjoy logic puzzles like Sudoku, Merge Numbers, Ten Match, or CrossMath, Panda Match Ten is your perfect nature escape. Train your brain, improve your memory, and boost logic—all with the charm of adorable pandas and soothing bamboo forests.
games.instructions: A brain-challenging yet calming number puzzle wrapped in the charm of pandas and green bamboo. Discover a delightful new take on number puzzles with Panda Match Ten! Perfect for fans of Sudoku, Number Match, Ten Crush, Make Ten, and other number-based games, this experience lets you sharpen your mind while immersing yourself in a serene bamboo world. Connect numbers that are identical or add up to 10 to clear the grid and help your panda progress through tranquil levels.

games.description: Rope Color Sort 3D is a creative puzzle game where players need to skillfully sort colorful ropes into their corresponding tubes. The game features beautiful 3D graphics and smooth physics effects, providing players with a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.
games.instructions: Using mouse to move the ropes

games.description: Mahjong Connect Fish World is a captivating puzzle game with an ocean theme. The game combines traditional connect-style gameplay with an ocean theme, providing players with a relaxing and enjoyable gaming experience.

games.description: Dive into a delightful puzzle experience with Candy Puzzle Match, where matching candies is all about tapping! Watch the board shift and cascade with every move as you complete deliciously fun objectives. With colorful visuals and satisfying chain reactions, this game is perfect for fans of casual and relaxing puzzle games.

games.description: Park Them All! – The Ultimate Parking Puzzle Challenge! Are you ready to put your parking skills to the test? games.description: Each puzzle brings you closer to unlocking fabulous fashionable combinations. Use power-ups to overcome challenges and to express your style, all while enjoying a relaxing and engaging gameplay. Can you create the perfect look?

games.instructions: Place objects on portals, connect three identical objects in a row to make them disappear. To complete the level, you need to free all portals from objects. On the computer: Drag objects with the left mouse button. On the phone: Drag objects with your finger.

games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

Be sure to try to get to the end of each level. Collect points and unlock new abilities!
games.instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Platformer game; Frenetic adventure; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the keyboard or screen buttons to play

games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.instructions: Pinch and move blocks of the same color and value and combine them. Throw blocks into the river to exchange them for coins and upgrade the power of the merge. If you want to make progress even faster, you can open the chest, which is unlocked

games.description: A highly addictive endless jumper with a super cute but mischievous character! Chain combos and score as high as you can!

As they progress through the game, they'll need to think creatively, utilizing magnetic forces to move, stack, and position elements to clear each level.

Get ready to embark on a thrilling journey of bridge construction and puzzle-solving as you draw roads to rescue the stranded car!

games.description: With a dynamic progression system, players unlock powerful bows, master challenging mechanics like wind and moving targets, and climb the leaderboards. From stationary targets to tricky trajectories, each level will test your reflexes and skill.

games.description: Candy Smash is a lively and addictive puzzle game where players tap on clusters of sweet candies to clear them and rack up points.
