Featuring bright, colorful graphics and a delightful candy-themed world, this match-and-clear adventure is perfect for players of all ages.
games.instructions: Tap on the same colored clusters of candies to remove them.

games.description: Zombie Derby Pixel Survival has never before been the destruction of zombies so bright, dynamic and fun. Take a new look at the world of the zombie apocalypse. Never before has killing zombies been so vibrant, dynamic and fun.
games.instructions: On PC: D or → - Drive A or → - Brake W or ↑ - Forward tilt A or ↓ - Tilt back Space - Turbo acceleration

games.description: Food Merge is a game where you combine different foods to create delicious dishes and serve them to hungry customers. Merge ingredients quickly and strategically to before the time runs out! Each level brings new challenges, faster orders, and more complex combos. Can you keep up and become the ultimate food master?
games.instructions: Mobile compatible Everything is controller by mouse or touch

games.description: Can you steal everything without getting caught? Test your agility and cunning! In "GTA: Top Thief" you will find: - Lots of shops and difficulties with different goods - Smart administrators – be careful! - Improve your skills - become stealthier and faster - Steal from sprunky, roblox and granny - Go through the story with exciting quests - Collect pets and stand out among thieves Each successful heist brings you closer to the title of the best thief in "GTA: Top Thief"!
games.instructions: To become the best thief you need: - Enter the game - Swinging in prison - Help Billy in his storyline - Use the tunnel to get to the location - Steal from stores using a box - Don't get caught with a box in your hands - Take everything you can out of the store!

games.description: Welcome to the wonderful world of Rollance Going Balls. This is an exciting and casual platform game. Control your colorful ball and roll it across a variety of well-designed platforms. Each jump and roll is like a “Rollance” performance full of luck and skill. Watch out for moving hammers.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Engage in an epic battle between Humans and The Fish! Your goal is simple: drag and hold to move the Human to the perfect spot to defeat The Fish. Watch out for obstacles and tough enemies along the way. Take down The Fish, then return safely to the starting point. But remember, only Humans of the same color can defeat The Fish! Experience exciting levels with increasing challenges, stunning 3D visuals, unique characters, and easy-to-learn controls for all ages. Enjoy the adventure!
games.instructions: Follow the game instructions!

games.description: Blast your way through the galaxy in intense battles. Enjoy beautiful graphic and exciting gameplay with tons of enemies as customizable ships.
games.instructions: Press and Drag to move your spaceship

games.description: Welcome to Parking Frenzy, the ultimate test of precision, planning, and timing! Forget everything you know about driving simulators—this game doesn’t need pedals, steering wheels, or complicated controls. Just swipe your finger, draw the perfect path, and let your car glide into the parking spot. With a stylish 3D look, dynamic environments, and intuitive gameplay, Parking Frenzy delivers a uniquely satisfying experience that’s easy to play and hard to master.
games.instructions: mouse only

games.description: Dive into Rootlings: Secrets of the Depths, an innovative turn-based game where you guide a root deep into the mysterious underworld. Collect water to survive, avoid hazards, and uncover surprises across exciting levels. Choose from Levels mode for challenges or Endless mode to climb the global leaderboard. Customize your root with stylish hats and enjoy minimalistic graphics and relaxing sounds in this unique underground adventure!
games.instructions: Controls on Mobile: Tap the plus signs to move left or right. Controls on PC: Use the F and V keys to move left or right. You can also use the arrow keys on your keyboard!

games.description: The game "BMG: CrashDay 2025" is an arcade racing simulator that combines elements of action and realism. Players can choose from a variety of cars, each with its own unique characteristics and appearance. The game has various tracks, each with its own features, such as difficult turns, steep climbs and descents, as well as various obstacles.
games.instructions: Controls: WASD - Control the car. Shift - nitro. R - flip the car. C - change camera. Tab - call MENU. T - Slow down time. Space - handbrake. G - hook up a trailer Controls for mobile devices: Use the game interface on the screen.

games.description: Dress Up Run – The Ultimate Fashion Race! Get ready for the most stylish and exciting fashion runway challenge! In Dress Up Run, you’ll sprint down the runway, collecting trendy outfits, glamorous accessories, and stunning hairstyles to create the perfect look. But be careful—choose the right pieces to match the theme and impress the crowd! Can you complete the race with the best outfit and become a true fashion icon?
games.instructions: Swipe to run

games.description: Bank Robbery: Escape is an intense FPS game title in shooting category, where your mission is to bust your crew out of a heavily guarded police station. Navigate through relentless police raids, arm yourself with the best gear, and make your escape before time runs out—or face the consequences. Will you outsmart the law or go down in a blaze of glory?
games.instructions: WASD = move Left-click = shoot Right-click = iron sight Mouse wheel = change weapons Left-shift = run Space = jump E = interact

games.description: In Meow Market, players take on the role of a charming white tabby cat running a bustling vegetable shop. To keep the business thriving, players must harvest fresh veggies by engaging in a click-match puzzle game. Selecting grouped matching vegetables to harvest them efficiently. Each harvest consumes one move, which regenerates over time, encouraging strategic decision-making.
games.instructions: Use mouse or tap to interact with in game elements.

games.description: Are you ready to become the owner of the coolest pet collection? Merge them, upgrade buildings and open new islands! The game offers you: - A constant influx of new pets - collect, merge and open rare ones! - Upgrade your lab, market and home for even more opportunities - Sell pets, earn money and build your empire Open all the islands, pump up your pets to the maximum and create your own pet empire in "Obby +1 Pet Every Second"!
games.instructions: To become a pet master, you need to: - Collect pets - they appear every second! - Merge pets into stronger ones with each level. - Upgrade your lab, market, and house for more efficient merging and selling. - Sell pets for money to develop your island. - Open new islands by upgrading your collection. - Reach the maximum pet level and become a real tycoon!

games.description: Are you ready to be a superhero and have a racing adventure? In Superhero Transform - Change Race,you should run and transform! In the challenging track, you will incarnate different superheroes. Use their special abilities to avoid obstacles and surpass opponents. Each transformation has a unique skill set. For example, you can become Spider-Man and climb rock. Turn into a shark and swim quickly to the next challenge; Turn into the Flash and sprint to the finish line, etc.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: "Nuts & Bolts: Screw Glass" is a creative puzzle game. In this meticulously designed mechanical world, you need to match different screws to their corresponding colored boxes. Every move requires careful consideration, as unmatched screws will fall into the groove at the bottom — once the groove is filled, the game is over.
games.instructions: Simple and intuitive controls: Just use your left mouse button to perform all game actions!

games.description: Get ready for an exciting challenge. Truck Stack Colors takes you into a wonderful world of parkour and truck stacking. In attractive levels, advance by stacking platforms that are the same color as the truck. To master the balancing and stacking skills to build amazing truck towers and climb even higher.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Deadflip Frenzy is a wild stunt-flipping action game where chaos meets style! Launch your character into the air, pull off insane flips, twists, and bone-crunching landings — all in the name of fun (and maybe a little destruction). Bounce off trampolines, launch from cannons, smash through obstacles, and aim for the most outrageous combos. The more insane your flip, the higher your score. But beware — one bad landing and it’s ragdoll mayhem!
games.instructions: mouse only

games.description: Unleash your destructive side in this ultimate demolition experience! Enjoy realistic tower destruction with dynamic physics, and take control of time—slow it down, speed it up, or freeze the action. Experiment with gravity modes, from low to high or even zero gravity, and customize every detail, including debris levels, destructibility, and atmospheric dust. Built for fans of destruction, this game offers the smash-and-crash fun you've been craving!
games.instructions: From the computer, press the LMB (Left Mouse Button) to shoot. Movement on WASD (and QE to raise the camera). Mouse wheel up/down - speeds up (slows down) time. T - starts the timer to explode the installed charges. F - stop time. B - weaponry. Escape (2 times) - menu. The rest is through the game interface. For mobile use your fingers and game interface :)

games.description: Enter a running arcade adventure filled with food and fun challenges. BBQ Stack Run takes you through the craziest BBQ-collecting parkour ever. Pick up various ingredients such as beef, chicken, sausage and more on the track as you run. Sprinkle them with barbecue seasoning and cook them through.
games.instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

games.description: Granny GTA Vegas drops the infamous horror legend into the heart of sin city! Armed and unhinged, Granny escapes her haunted house and brings chaos to the neon streets of Las Vegas. With red-hooded masked enemies hot on her trail, she must shoot her way through crime-ridden alleys, casino districts, and the Vegas Strip.
games.instructions: mouse only

games.description: Get ready for a fast-paced typing challenge in Typing Adventure! Type the words above each enemy to defeat them before they get too close. The longer you survive, the faster they come! How long can your fingers keep up? Battle endless waves and test your speed in this thrilling typing survival game!
games.instructions: Type the text that appear above enemy

games.description: Pimple Squeeze – The Most Satisfying Pimple Popping Game! Love the oddly satisfying feeling of pimple popping? Get ready for Pimple Squeeze, the ultimate skincare simulation game where you pop, squeeze, and clean pores in the most relaxing way! Remove blackheads, clear whiteheads, and achieve smooth, glowing skin!
games.instructions: Tap & squeeze to pop pimples carefully! Remove blackheads & clean pores for fresh skin Use skincare tools like tweezers & masks for the best results Complete levels & unlock new challenges

games.description: Tunnel Road is an adrenaline-filled arcade game that requires quick reflexes, sharp focus and a great visual reaction! Keep up with the speed, avoid obstacles and cover the longest distance while advancing in a colorful and dynamic tunnel!
games.instructions: When the game starts, select 1 or 2-player mode. Avoid obstacles in the tunnel by dodging to the right or left. PLAYER 1: - Use "A" or "LEFT ARROW" to move left. - Use "D" or "RIGHT ARROW" to move right. PLAYER 2: "LEFT ARROW" to move left. "RIGHT ARROW" to move right. Use touch controls on mobile devices (tablets and phones). The longer you last, the higher your score. Stay focused to keep up with the tempo of the game!

games.description: Aim for high scores or complete level objectives. Rotate and arrange blocks to clear rows and columns while enjoying stunning visuals. Each perfect move brings satisfaction, challenging you to beat your best and master each puzzle!
games.instructions: The game offers endless levels where players move and match colored blocks to complete rows or columns. Scoring high is essential before the board fills up. 17 unique blocks can be rotated in any of the 4 directions, making strategic placement crucial to success.

games.description: Skill game, classic mode from your favorite games right in the browser on your computer and phone! More levels and more mechanics await for you
games.instructions: Desktop: • SPACE - jump • WASD - move • L. SHIFT - running • Double Escape - Menu Mobile: • Touch

games.description: Discover a new genre in the world of puzzles! This game intertwines block puzzles with a thrilling adventure on tropical islands! Complete levels to earn stars, unlock new territories and unique relaxation areas. From snow-white beaches to dense jungles – each location is filled with unique challenges. The booster system will help you in difficult situations, and the well-thought-out mechanics allow both beginners and experienced players to enjoy the game.
games.instructions: A relaxing puzzle game where you connect blocks while traveling through picturesque tropical islands. Collect stars, unlock new locations and immerse yourself in the resort atmosphere!

games.description: Get ready for bubble-popping fun in Bubble Game 3D, a super cool version of the original classic Bubble Shooter game, now with amazing 3D graphics. Aim, match, and pop colorful bubbles in a world that looks like it’s coming right out of the screen. This is Bubble Shooter 3D like you’ve never seen before!
games.instructions: Aim the arrow and click to shoot bubbles. Match three or more of the same color to pop them. Clear the board before the bubbles reach the bottom. Use wall bounces for tricky shots and plan a head for combos.

games.description: Step into the vibrant world of BFFs Cherry Blossom Celebration, the ultimate dress-up game where best friends come together to shine under blooming cherry trees! Pick your favorite crew of BFFs and deck them out in stunning spring outfits—think pastel dresses, floral crowns, and cherry blossom vibes.
games.instructions: Left mouse Button click or tap to play

games.description: Merge Flowers is a relaxing and addictive puzzle game! Grow your vibrant garden, discover unique flowers, and earn coins. Enjoy merge puzzle and match-3 mechanics as you combine flowers to create a blooming paradise. With simple controls and cozy visuals, place flowers strategically to make space for new plants. Perfect for puzzle lovers and fans of casual idle games, Merge Flowers offers endless fun and a soothing experience. Start your floral journey today!
games.instructions: Flowers appear at the bottom of the screen, and your task is to place them wisely on the field based on their color. Match three or more in a row to clear them and earn coins. As you advance, your field expands, and the flowers become even more stunning! Start growing your beautiful garden today!

games.description: Becoming the Strongest Bartending Master！Tap the bottle lightly to pour water. Organize the water so that each bottle's water is distributed to the corresponding colored cup!
games.instructions: In the game, by clicking on the colored cup, unlock the same color of the glass to complete the level.

games.description: This is Solitaire Mahjong at its best, offering a classic and elegant mahjong experience without any need to rush. Known as one of the top mahjong games, it features a beautifully traditional layout that fans of mahjong puzzles will love. With polished graphics, a soothing soundtrack, and no timer, Solitaire Mahjong invites you to enjoy each move at a relaxed pace, focusing purely on the pleasure of the game.
games.instructions: Match identical tiles that have at least one side free and are not covered by other tiles. Each match earns points, adding a touch of strategy to every move. If you’re ever stuck, use the hint function for a helpful nudge. Enjoy a leisurely game without any countdowns—just pure mahjong relaxation.

games.description: Hooligans have taken over the city streets. Join the battle for order in the city! You are a street fighter and want to protect your city from the invasion of hooligans! You will have to visit every corner of the city. Clear the streets of criminals and hooligans with the help of your fighting skills! Deliver cool blows, combine blows to get crazy techniques! In this battle, every blow is important, train to fight back against hooligans and their Bosses.
games.instructions: PC - Left-click on the strike icon to perform a single strike. To perform a series of strikes and make a combo, hold down the left mouse button and move the cursor through several strike icons. Mobile - Click your finger on the strike icon to perform a single strike. To perform a series of strikes and make a combo, move your finger through several strike icons.

games.description: Limited Defense is a strategic tower defense game where you command bandits, archers, and explosive towers to hold back relentless waves of enemies. Face off against mischievous Green Slimes, fearsome Orcs, and towering bosses like the Boss King Slime. Upgrade your defenses, unlock legendary warriors, and test your tactical skills in intense, fast-paced battles! Can you make it in this tower defense game?
games.instructions: Use the left mouse button to drag and drop the allies. Click them to upgrade and sell.

games.description: Drag the ball, set your direction, and navigate through a cosmic field! Collect all the stars while skillfully avoiding dangerous spikes. How many can you gather?
games.instructions: Press and hold to drag the ball, setting its direction and power. Let go to launch the ball toward your desired path. Collect stars and avoid spikes to progress through the level.

games.description: Start your journey as the owner of a small burger joint and work your way up to building a massive fast food empire! Take full control of every aspect of the business—from grilling delicious burgers and serving customers to managing staff and expanding your restaurant chain. Upgrade your kitchen, optimize your workflow, and attract more customers to grow your brand. Can you turn your humble burger stand into the ultimate fast food empire?
games.instructions: Swipe on the screen to move your character around the restaurant. Prepare delicious burgers, serve customers, and manage your fast food business efficiently. Expand your restaurant and grow your burger empire!

games.description: GT Formula Championship is an exhilarating high-speed racing game that brings the thrill of Formula racing to life. Step into the driver’s seat of the most powerful and technologically advanced Formula cars as you compete against elite racers on world-class tracks. With intense competition, realistic physics, and breathtaking visuals, this game delivers an adrenaline-fueled experience like no other.
games.instructions: use arrow keys to move

games.description: Sniper Shot Secret Mission is a game of nerves and skills. Each time you start the new level, a challenge is waiting for you to solve. Never fire on the wrong target otherwise their no second chance as a sniper. As a sniper you need to work silently once you shoot the bullet everyone will be aware of the situation and you might loose your target. You can be targeted through security guards once you shoot at your high profile targets.
games.instructions: Sniper Shot Secret Mission gives you experience of hired assassin. Shoot your targets and be the best sniper shooter. Every level gives you different situation, so analyse the situation carefully.

games.description: Sprunki Easter Coloring is an exciting and colorful online game designed especially for kids who love to explore their imagination. This delightful digital coloring book lets young artists express themselves through a fun and festive Easter theme. With charming Sprunki characters and spring-inspired backgrounds, children can dive into a world of creativity that is both relaxing and full of color. And the best part—it is completely free to play online.
games.instructions: Mouse to play.

games.description: Discover the exciting world of finding hidden cats in this original puzzle game! Look for cats on black and white backgrounds by tapping on them to complete levels. With each stage, you will unlock new places and receive unique challenges that will test your attentiveness and observation skills.
games.instructions: The goal of the game is to find hidden cats on black and white backgrounds by clicking on them to complete levels. The game trains attentiveness, observation skills and brings pleasure from searching for cats in unexpected places. - To select a cat - click on it (LMB on desktop). - To move around the map - hold on it and move (hold LMB on desktop). - To change the scale - pinch or spread your fingers (mouse wheel on desktop).
